children.value: A rare opportunity to imbibe the essence of successfully scaling up businesses from industry stalwarts.

cards.title: M.S. Unnikrishnan
cards.designation: CEO, IITB-Monash Research Academy

children.value: Mr. M. S. Unnikrishnan (Unny) is the CEO of IITB-Monash Research Academy, a research institute dedicated to a PhD program in cutting edge technologies and management, jointly promoted by IIT Bombay and the Monash University of Australia. He has previously held the position of M.D. & CEO of Thermax Group for over 13 years and played a pivotal role in the growth, professionalisation and globalisation of the company.

He serves on KEC International and Azure Power Limited boards. He is also a trustee of “Akshaya Patra,” the largest NGO of India that feeds 19 lakhs/ day underprivileged school children, and Jehangir Hospital, Pune.
Mr. Unnikrishnan chairs the Central Mechanical Engineering Research Institute (CMERI), Durgapur, and is a member of the Governing Councils of TERI and Army Institute of Technology.
He is also associated with the Government of India as:

– Co-Chairperson of “Srijan” program for SIDBI-TIFAC for start-up funding
– Member, Apex Council, Prime Minister’s Doctoral Research Fellowship
– Director of the Technology Innovation Hub, IIT Palakkad
– Expert committee member, SAIF Centres, Ministry of Science & Tech, GOI
– Expert committee member, SATHI program, Ministry of Science & Tech, GOI

A graduate in Mechanical Engineering from VNIT, Nagpur, he has also completed his Advanced Management Program from the Harvard Business School, Boston, USA. He continues to be a keen student of energy, environment, and management.

cards.title: Izumi Yamamoto
cards.designation: Leadership Trainer & Coach, Rockwood Leadership Institute

children.value: Izumi is a leadership trainer, facilitator and executive coach with over two decades of experience working alongside leaders across cultures and sectors. Her professional background spans four continents which brings a diverse perspective to her work integrating inner and outer leadership practices and matters of the soul. She is a co-founder and president of Perennial where she serves as the lead trainer and coach for senior leaders and executive teams in Asia, America, Africa and the Middle East to elevate their effectiveness of leadership and collaborations in their work. An ardent practitioner of meditation, she has guided leaders in deepening their own inner well-being practices to lead with greater awareness and aliveness. She is based in Seattle, Washington.

cards.title: Amit Kalra
cards.designation: Chief Transformation Officer, HLE Glascoat Limited

children.value: Prior to his recent role as the Chief Transformation Officer, HLE Glascoat; Advisory Board Member, THALETEC GmbH; Chief Transformation Officer, Yashasvi Rasayan Private Limited; Amit was the Member of the Executive Management Team at Hilti Manufacturing India, which is a subsidiary of the Europe-based multinational Hilti Group. With close to two decades of exhaustive experience, Amit has worked across some of the world’s large engineering and technology companies, including Hilti, Umicore and Infineon, and has held leadership positions internationally. Amit is passionate about organizational development and his life purpose is to build and help other leaders build caring and high performing organizations. Amit frequently speaks on leadership, entrepreneurship and organizational consciousness at various IITs, other premier institutes and entrepreneurial forums across India on his original content known as “we need to move from ambition to vision” and “six pillars of organizational greatness”. He holds academic degrees from India and Germany in Engineering and an MBA from ESSEC Mannheim Business School with campuses in Germany and France. He is also a certified Culture Transformation practitioner from Barrett Values Center UK and a Yoga and Meditation practitioner from Isha Yoga Center and is a promoter of Conscious Leadership. He is married, has one child, is settled in Gujarat since the last 6 years and has spent 13 years in Germany and Switzerland prior to that.

cards.title: Nina Chatrath
cards.designation: Leadership and Business Consultant; Independent Board Director, Oriental Hotels, Dwarikesh Sugars & Vision Springs

children.value:
Nina has spent the last two decades guiding businesses to excellence, through quality and leadership initiatives, as she donned the hat of a trusted advisor to organizations. Her key focus area has been to unlock organizational capabilities using business and behavioral interventions. She focuses on building the strategic momentum of the business by working with the top leaders, which is at the heart of what value an HR leader can bring to the organization.

CEO Development and Succession Planning is a delivery expectation from Boards, as also having a robust process to review CEO’s performance in a way that enhances their leadership and company’s performance. As she works towards unlocking the potential of key leaders through coaching, she witnesses the effect it has on the individual performance leading to organizational excellence.

sectionContent.title: Key Resource Leaders and Speakers at Family Enterprise Excellence 2023

children.value: A rare opportunity to imbibe the essence of successfully scaling up businesses from industry stalwarts.

cards.title: G. M. Rao
cards.designation: Founder & Chairman, GMR Group

children.value: G M Rao, a mechanical engineer, is the Founder Chairman of GMR Group, the Bangalore based global infrastructure developer.
Born in a small town of Rajam in the Srikakulam district of Andhra Pradesh in India, G M Rao established the GMR business empire starting from a single jute mill in 1978.

He entered 28 businesses as a serial entrepreneur and exited most of them with the opportunities thrown up by the opening up of the Indian economy in the early 1990s. Eventually, his single-minded focus on the core infrastructure sector resulted in the Group exiting some of the highly attractive businesses of banking, insurance, software, breweries, jute and sugar.

Over the last 33 years he has successfully established GMR Group, as one of the most recognized brands in the country, creating national infrastructure assets of global scale and world-class quality, creating new benchmarks.

He received the award for the ‘First Generation Entrepreneur of the Year’ from CNBC TV18 in 2009 as well as the Infrastructure Person of the Year award at the Infrastructure Journal Award Ceremony held in London in 2009. He was also chosen as the ‘Entrepreneur of the year’ at the Economic Times Awards for Corporate Excellence 2006 – 07. He has recently been nominated on the very prestigious Central Board of Directors of Reserve Bank of India (RBI).

cards.title: Vellayan Subbiah
cards.designation: Chairman, Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Co. Ltd., & MD, Tube Investments of India Ltd

children.value:
Mr. Vellayan Subbiah, son of Padma Bhushan M V Subbiah, is part of the fourth generation of the Murugappa family.

Mr. Vellayan holds a Bachelor of Technology in Civil Engineering from IIT Madras and an MBA from the University of Michigan. He has over 23 years of experience in varied fields viz., technology, projects and financial services. He has worked with McKinsey and Company, 24/7 Customer Inc. and Sundram Fasteners Ltd. He was a recipient of the Extraordinary Entrepreneur of the Year – TiECON 2014 Award. He was the Managing Director of Laserwords Private Ltd from 2007-10 and of Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Limited from 2010-17. He is currently the Managing Director of Tube Investments of India Ltd.

Mr. Vellayan is an avid cyclist and a marathon runner.

children.value: Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore
14 DEC –17 DEC 2023

A 4-day experiential program for emerging leaders in Family Businesses. This program is an invitation to embark on a transformative journey of crafting lasting success and a legacy for your family enterprise.
Mapping the Future of Your Business
Family businesses
, which account for 79% of India’s GDP, have the power to shape the socioeconomic trajectory of India and the world.
Envisioned by Sadhguru, “Family Enterprise Excellence” focuses on unleashing the
untapped potential of participants
, enabling them to navigate critical family-related business challenges and map the future of their enterprises with a sense of generational responsibility, inspiration, and insight.

sectionContent.quote: Only one who has insight, who sees what others do not, can be a true leader.

children.value: ...and craft an inspiring and exciting future for your enterprise
...your resilience to make your business more bold and enterprising
...more deeply with yourself and increase awareness of your leadership behaviours and potential
...a community of support and practice for leading forward
...the power of conscious response and its impact on your enterprise
A rare opportunity to imbibe the essence of successfully scaling up businesses from industry stalwarts.

faqs.question: What is the "Family Enterprise Excellence: Mapping the Future of Your Business" program?

children.value: The "Family Enterprise Excellence" program is an exclusive 4-day transformative experience designed by Sadhguru to empower emerging entrepreneurs and next-generation leaders in family-owned businesses. It focuses on addressing challenges unique to family enterprises and offers insights, tools, and mentorship to create a transformative future.

faqs.question: Who should participate in the program?

children.value: The program is tailored for members of family-owned businesses, including next-generation leaders, current business owners, and key family stakeholders seeking to navigate family dynamics and succession planning.

faqs.question: Who are the featured speakers in the program?

children.value: The program features prominent industry experts, including Vellayan Subbiah, MS Unnikrishnan, G. M. Rao, and Sangeeta Reddy (to be confirmed), who will share their real-life experiences and insights with participants.

faqs.question: When and where will the program take place?

children.value: The "Family Enterprise Excellence" program is scheduled from 14-17 December 2023 at the Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore.

faqs.question: How can I contact the program organizers for more information?

children.value: For inquiries, you can reach us at +91-8300084888 or write to us at leadership@ishainsight.org.

faqs.question: What is the significance of family businesses in India's economy?

children.value: Family businesses contribute significantly to India's GDP, accounting for 79% of the total. They play a vital role in the nation's economy and embody values such as trust, integrity, and kinship.

faqs.question: How does the program empower participants?

children.value: The program empowers participants to envision the future of their family businesses, navigate challenges, and foster generational responsibility, inspiration, and insight. It offers tools, mentorship, and insights to unlock leadership potential for transformative innovation and conscious entrepreneurship.

faqs.question: What are the focus areas of the program?

children.value: The program covers crucial topics, including managing family expectations, succession planning, conflict resolution, leadership behaviors, and conscious entrepreneurship.

faqs.question: What are the unique features of the program?

children.value: - A 4-day immersive experience for emerging entrepreneurs and next-gen leaders in family businesses.
- Exclusive program for a small cohort of next-generation business leaders.
- Learning from real-life multi-generational family business case studies.
- Guidance and mentorship from industry experts.
- Insights from Sadhguru on leading family businesses.

faqs.question: Is prior experience in family business required to participate?

children.value: No prior experience is required. The program has been developed for new and experienced entrepreneurs who work within a family business setting.

faqs.question: How do I apply for the program?

children.value: To apply, please fill out the registration form.

faqs.question: Is financial assistance available for the program?

children.value: Currently, we do not offer financial assistance for this program.

faqs.question: Can participants attend the program more than once?

children.value: Yes, participants are welcome to attend the program multiple times to deepen their insights and apply new strategies.

faqs.question: What language are the program sessions conducted in?

children.value: The primary language of the program sessions is English.

faqs.question: Is the program certified or accredited?

children.value: The "Family Enterprise Excellence" program is an exclusive offering by Isha Leadership Academy and does not hold official certification or accreditation from external institutions. However, participants will receive a certificate of completion at the end of the program to acknowledge their participation and learning.

faqs.question: Who is a Resource Leader? Can I ask questions to the Resource Leader?

children.value: A Resource Leader is a highly experienced individual from a diverse range of industries, who provides valuable insights and guidance during the Insight program. During the program, a Resource Leader will be assigned to your table, and you will have the opportunity to interact with them one-on-one. They will guide you through the sessions and various workshop-style activities, and you can ask them questions and seek their expertise throughout the program.

faqs.question: Who is a Speaker? Can I ask questions to the Speaker?

children.value: A Speaker is an experienced individual with expertise in a specific field, sharing insights on topics such as disruption, scaling up, innovation, and more. They provide valuable learning to participants. Participants can ask questions to the speaker during a Q&A session following their presentation.

children.value: Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore
23 NOV - 26 NOV 2023
A four-day business leadership intensive to explore the science of scaling up one’s business and one’s self.
The program offers a rare chance to
see through the eyes of successful leaders
and experientially imbibe the DNA of Success.
THE DNA OF SUCCESS

slides.title: See Through the Eyes of Industry Leaders

children.value: Through live case studies of iconic business leaders, we will deconstruct their professional and personal lives to derive the secrets of their many successes.

slides.title: See Through the Lens of Expert Practitioners

children.value: Professional mentors and practitioners from the industry will be present to help the attendees address their specific challenges.
Led by Sadhguru
, the program is an intense and joyful/exuberant exploration of how to
enhance one’s ability to “see,”
the most essential ingredient to lead business growth and expansion.

sectionContent.quote: Only one who has insight, who sees what others do not, can be a true leader.

children.value: Founder & Chairman, GMR Group

This country is a land of entrepreneurs. In 15 years, 25% of the workforce in the world will be Indians and a huge impact will be there for India as the future for the world. I think this type of activity like 'Insight - the DNA of success', will be a great opportunity for all of us to shape what success is.
Founder, MakeMyTrip

I think most conferences you go to imbibe knowledge and therefore the focus is IQ. For me this conference has been about EQ. And I think the emotional quotient here is just so high. Obviously led by Sadghuru, but everyone around has such high EQ you cannot help but bring out the best of yourself.
Managing Director & Chief Executive Officer, Bandhan Bank
This is a very good experience. And how the participants have been was very inspiring for me. It was organized in a fantastic way. I feel honored to have been invited here.
Co-Founder, AceVector Group (Snapdeal, Unicommerce and Stellaro)

I think the most striking thing for me here is just the overall positive energy that I feel. There is this desire to learn, desire to contribute, desire to galvanize that is quite amazing. And all of it is with a very positive vibe, very positive connotation, and positive energy.
Director, Himalayan Institute of Alternatives, Ladakh; Teacher at SECMOL

It's been wonderful coming to a very tranquil place like this and yet seeing a lot of bustling activity, very enthusiastic participants and a lot of good vibrations from everybody, so warm and welcoming people around. I'm very, very happy and impressed.
Founder, Infosys

I was so pleased to hear from Sadhguru about his belief in the importance of entrepreneurs building businesses to create jobs. It has been a great privilege to come here to meet Sadhguru, and to listen to him and start the journey of imbibing all the wonderful insights that he has on becoming better human beings. It is an even greater privilege to be in the company of 200+ entrepreneurs, who are starting the revolution of creating lots of jobs and thereby reducing the problem of poverty in this country.
real-life case studies of iconic business leaders to deconstruct and derive the secrets of their success.
by over 20 business leaders, with a combined rich industry experience of more than 500 years, on your individual scaling up challenges.
through the eyes of a Mystic as Sadhguru offers his inspirational yet delightfully simple and pragmatic perspectives on leadership and its many challenges.
with a highly accomplished peer group; get access to INSIGHT alumni and receive invaluable support throughout your scale-up journey.
your inner-self with simple but powerful tools designed by Sadhguru to help develop insight, while being rooted in inner stability and balance.
Chief Delivery Officer, Apexon

Nowhere else is this kind of a combination available; the opportunity to learn from academicians, from practitioners and from a great mystic like Sadhguru, bringing together diverse perspectives on management and entrepreneurial topics. What makes this experience all the more wonderful is the unique setting of this ashram, which gives you a rare opportunity to think of what you want to do in the future in a totally stress free and calm ambient environment.
Managing Director, Susee Group

What they were able to give us in terms of insights into management, into leadership and into various challenges that they converted into opportunities – these were just absolutely invaluable. The kind of networking we got to do, the kind of people we got to meet in this program were again fantastic.
Founder & Director, Storm the Norm Ventures
I have attended innumerable national and global business leadership conferences but what Insight has done for me in just 3 days is simply phenomenal. It has changed the way I work and live.
Head of Business, Cheil Worldwide
The business opportunities, the design, the lexicon and the narrative are very exciting! It is different from any other leadership program in the world.
President, Phillips Corporation
It's absolutely terrific, really amazing and unbelievable. I have been to so many business seminars over the years, and surely this is the best of all time.
CEO, Neuland Laboratories Ltd
It would have taken me ten years to get all the lessons and the insights that I got in those 3 or 4 days.
A rare opportunity to imbibe the essence of successfully scaling up businesses from industry stalwarts.

cards.title: Bhavish Aggarwal
cards.designation: Founder & CEO, Ola

children.value:
Bhavish Aggarwal is the Founder & CEO of Ola, one of the world’s largest ride-sharing platforms and India’s most popular mobile app for transportation. With the mission of building mobility for a billion people, he started Ola (formerly OlaCabs) in 2010 with Ankit Bhati, a fellow alumnus from the Indian
Institute of Technology in Mumbai, the country’s premier institution for technology and science.
Before Ola, Bhavish worked with Microsoft Research for two years, filing two patents alongside having three papers published in international academic journals.

Ola is now one of India’s most valuable and respected new economy organization with 10,00,000 driver partners in over 110+ cities. The company offers 14 services across diverse categories including business-class vehicles, shared transport and auto rickshaws. With over a billion rides annually, Ola is a true blue Indian unicorn which believes in responsible consumption with shared transportation key to that agenda. True to this spirit, Bhavish doesn’t own a car and vows that he never will.

As a rapidly-growing organization that nurtures the spirit of innovation and entrepreneurship, Ola took the first big step in spreading its wings outside of India with the launch in Australia in early 2018, followed by its entry in UK. This move is line with Ola’s vision of solving globally relevant problems with hyperlocal solutions.
Honors and Recognition:

• Entrepreneur of the Year – Economic Times

• Disruptor of the Year, Asia Business Leader Awards – CNBC-TV18

• Unicorn of the Year – NDTV

• Young Turks e-Vangelist – CNBC-TV18

• 30under30 – Forbes India

• Startup of the Year – Business Standard

• Mobility Leader – Express IT Awards

• Startup of the Year – Economic Times

• Leadership Award for Outstanding Startup – Forbes India

• Consumer Internet Company of the Year – VCCircle

• Global Growth Companies – World Economic Forum

• Innovation in Transportation Award – Frost and Sullivan

cards.title: Shri. S. Somanath
cards.designation: Chairman, Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO)

children.value:
Shri. Somanath, a distinguished scientist, is the current chairperson of the Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO), the premier space agency of India. He was appointed to this position in January 2022.

Prior to this, he was the director of the Vikram Sarabhai Space Centre. He also held the positions of Director of the Liquid Propulsion Systems Centre. While he was the Project Director of the GSLV Mk-III Launch Vehicle, their first experimental mission was successfully accomplished in 2014.

Shri. Somanath obtained B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering from TKM College of Engineering, Kollam, and Masters in Aerospace Engineering from Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. He joined VSSC in 1985 and was a team leader for the Integration of PSLV during the early phases.

He is the recipient of the ‘Space Gold Medal’ from the Astronautical Society of India. He received the ‘Merit Award” and ‘Performance Excellence award’ from ISRO and a ‘Team excellence award’ for GSLV Mk-III development.

He is a Fellow of the Indian National Academy of Engineering (INAE), a Fellow of the Aeronautical Society of India (AeSI), Astronautical Society of India (ASI), and a Corresponding Member of the International Academy of Astronautics (IAA). He is in the bureau of the International Astronautical Federation (IAF) and a recipient of the National Aeronautics Prize from the Aeronautical Society of India (ASI).

cards.title: Rajeev Chandrasekhar
cards.designation: Minister of State for Skill Development and Entrepreneurship and Electronics and Information Technology of India

children.value:
Shri Rajeev Chandrasekhar is the Union Minister of State for Electronics and Information Technology and Union Minister of State for Skill Development and Entrepreneurship.

He is an Indian politician and entrepreneur, technocrat and serving his third term as a Member of Parliament in the upper house (Rajya Sabha) from BJP representing Karnataka. He also served as National Spokesperson of BJP and was vice-chairman of the Kerala wing of the BJP-led coalition National Democratic Alliance.

For causes he believes in and supports, Shri Rajeev Chandrasekhar has apart from raising them in Parliament, actively approached the courts to intervene on behalf of citizens as in the case of Section 66A of the IT Act, securing voting rights for members of the Armed Forces among other issues. He is widely recognized as the most informed and active MP on Digital India, Internet and Technology issues, Spectrum Allocation, Net Neutrality, Consumer rights in cyber space policies and other regulatory matters.

It was his relentless campaign and later a petition in the Supreme Court that led to Armed Forces personnel getting the right to vote in their place of posting in the 2014 General Elections and further electoral reforms to bring the facility of e-Postal Ballot to Armed Forces. After the Uri Terror attack in September 2016, he was the first MP in India to have challenged the MFN status granted to Pakistan and submitted a Private Member's Bill in the Rajya Sabha on 18 November 2016 titled: "The Declaration of Countries as Sponsor of Terrorism Bill, 2016".

In February 2016, Rajeev was felicitated by the General Officer Commanding-in- Chief, Western Command, Lt Gen KJ Singh, PVSM, AVSM (Bar) with the GOC-in- C Commendation Card at HQ Western Command, Chandigarh for his support and work for the Armed Forces, veterans, and their families.

Additionally, he has focused on and taken up a wide array of macro-economic and micro-economic issues that include restructuring of Public Sector Banks, creating Transparency in the management of Public Assets and repairing key sectors in the economy to revive growth amongst others. Shri Rajeev Chandrasekhar's insight made him one of the first individuals to raise concerns regarding the ad hoc allocation of 2G licenses starting 2007 - which led to cancellation of 122 licenses by the Supreme Court of India in 2012.

cards.title: Shashank Kumar
cards.designation: Founder & CEO DeHaat

children.value: Shashank is Co-founder  and CEO of DeHaat who has led the organisation to a current milestone of 500,000+ digitised farmers network in India  and current annual growth rate of 3.5x. He believes that technology can bring efficiency and transparency for the supply chain between different businesses and smallholders & that's exactly what DeHaat has been building. He has also been awarded as Forbes 30 under 30 in 2014 & BWDisrupt 40 under 40 in 2018. He is also an Ashoka fellow who has been awarded as distinguished alumni of IIT Delhi in 2017 for significant contribution for national development. He has been awarded as " Champions of Change" by PM - India & Niti Aayog in 2018. Hence DeHaat aims to bring 10mn Indian farmers together at one platform for various agri businesses. Shashank has raised USD 46 mn of investment for DeHaat from marquee funds like Nasper, Sequoia, FMO, Omnivore & AgFunder. Prior to DeHaat, He worked as a consultant in the supply chain industry for 3 years after he graduated from IIT Delhi in 2008.

cards.title: Mithun Sacheti
cards.designation: Founder & MD, CaratLane

children.value: Mithun Sacheti is the founder of CaratLane, an online jeweler in India and one of the country’s leading ecommerce companies. Mithun grew up in the jewelry industry and prior to founding CaratLane, he opened new stores for his family business throughout the southern regions of the country. He has studied gemology in California and Bombay.

cards.title: Amit Anchal
cards.designation: Board Member, Ola Electric

children.value:
Amit is a Board member of Ola Electric and has led Strategy, Corporate Finance and Corporate Development for Ola & Ola Electric for the last couple of years.

He partners with the Founder (Bhavish Aggarwal) in bringing strategic direction to the businesses as well as leads the corporate finance for the group including Equity, Debt fundraising, Capital Market (IPO), Corporate structuring, M&A etc.

Prior to his current role, Amit led similar role for Airtel and Bharti Group Companies.

Amit has always worked with first generation enterprises. Before his current role with Bhavish, he was with Airtel working directly with Sunil Mittal in various roles for 18 years.

Amit has worked with first generation entrepreneurs in building strategy and executing fast growth. In the last 24 months he has worked closely with Bhavish as Ola electric scaled up to be the iconic EV play in India.

Similarly, he has been part of Bharti and Airtel’s phenomenal growth and expansion for close to 18 years.

He has also been a part of several strategic and growth initiatives such as Indus and Infratel Towerco creation, Africa passive infra sale and lease back, IT & Network outsourcing (all Harvard Case studies now).

Amit has been a foremost deal-maker and fund raiser (Private and Capital markets) throughout his career. In Airtel itself he has successfully executed over 70 large transactions of M&A, Fundraising, JV etc. Many of these deals are multi-billion dollar ones.

Amit enjoys very strong relationships with funds across VC, PE and Capital market spectrum and has led fundraising that are largest in the PE space in India.

He has worked on businesses across sectors including Consumer Internet, EV, Fintech, Telecom, Towers, Renewable energy etc.

cards.title: Anala Padmanabha
cards.designation: Consultant, Director, Mckinsey/UAE

children.value:
Anala Padmanabha, is a leader in the People & Organizational Performance Practice. She delivers growth, innovation, and organizational agility and is an expert on culture change, leadership development, team effectiveness, capability building, and transformation. She also works extensively with clients to drive organizational effectiveness at pivotal moments—such as merger, strategic shift, and crisis—and lead large-scale performance improvement programs integrating strategic, operational, and cultural initiatives.

Anala’s consulting journey began with EY as senior consultant majoring in Mergers and Acquisitions. Being a Chartered Accountant gave her further insights into international business and relations. This exposure took her to work with IDA and other international organizations associated in fostering a healthy culture, Diversity, Inclusion and a holistic growth oriented economy. McKinsey offered Anala a platform to build sustainable human development and performance models along with powering the learning and development engine of many organizations, Governments, Non-Profit Organizations to name a few.

Anala is also the founder director of a real estate Development firm in Benagaluru, which aims at building ESG and sustainable buildings. Featured by the Architectural digest, this award winning firm has projects all over India and aboard, aiming at building sustainable and Environmental friendly projects.

Anala is an active volunteer at Isha Foundation, a trained classical singer, a yoga practitioner and meditator, an avid reader, a certified scuba diver, a teacher and loves spending time with students. She thinks that the future leadership should be that of inclusion and responsible.

cards.title: Arvind K Singhal
cards.designation: Founder & Chairman of Technopak Advisors

children.value:
Arvind (61 years) is the Founder & Chairman of Technopak Advisors. Having started its operations on January 1992, Technopak is one of India’s leading management consulting firms focusing on 4 key sectors that include consumer products and retail, textiles and apparel, packaged food & food services, and education & skills development.

He has a Bachelor of Engineering degree from IIT-Roorkee, India (1979) that has also recognized him as a “Distinguished Alumnus”, India and an MBA from UCLA, USA (1982). Over the years, Arvind has been invited to speak at leading academic institutions and professional forums which include Harvard (USA), Wharton (USA), UCLA (USA), ESADE (Spain), various IIMs (India) and IITs (India), and the Vatican (Italy) to list a few. He also writes frequently for leading Indian and International publications with over 400 published pieces to date.

Arvind sits on several Boards (including some not-for-profit). He is currently on the statutory Boards of Welspun India, Greaves Cotton Ltd., Blue Star Ltd., Metro Shoes, and Premium Transmission Ltd.

cards.title: Deepta Rangarajan
cards.designation: President and Co-Founder, IRIS Business Services Limited

children.value: Deepta is Co-Founder of IRIS Business Services (BSE: IRIS), a global regtech firm with clients in over 40 countries around the world, and a leader in the space of open data standards for financial reporting. Deepta has led and managed some of IRIS’ flagship products and key business lines over the past 30 years. She was part of a core team that drove IRIS’ business pivot from services to products 7 years ago, and is currently sponsoring the fastest growing business line in IRIS. Prior to IRIS, Deepta worked at American Express Bank and CRISIL. A graduate of Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi and Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad, Deepta has been profiled in the bestseller, ‘Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish’, which chronicles the journey of 25 entrepreneurs from IIM Ahmedabad. She was also featured as one of Navi Mumbai’s Power Women. Deepta enjoys reading, singing (and humming) and working with her teams at IRIS to help them in whatever way she can, as they blaze through new challenges in their professional journey each day.

cards.title: Gajendra Chandel
cards.designation: Founder, Viribus Unitis Consulting; Former CHRO, TATA Motors

children.value: Gajendra Chandel is Former President and CHRO, Tata Motors. He joined Tata Motors in 2014, from another Tata Group Company, Tata AutoComp Systems where he was the Group CHRO from 2005 to 2014. At Tata Motors, he led the Reorganisation, Restructuring, and Re-energising Project as part of the Transformation agenda with the responsibility of various strategic growth initiatives of the company. He also pioneered Next-Gen HR and Business practices, seen as trendsetters and industry benchmarks. In pursuit of transformation, he piloted significant initiatives, e.g., building a robust Leadership pipeline, rejuvenated business performance process re-skilling/up-skilling, employee experience and resource productivity, market footprint, customer experience, making the organization agile and lean fighting machine, to be amongst the top global players. Previously, he worked with Siemens in India, Germany, and the USA for almost 13 years where he held various operational and strategic assignments at local, country, and international levels, including the Global Leadership Framework Project. He was honored with the Leader of the Year Award in 1997 by LMI Inc. The USA. Gajendra loves photography, hiking, and reading. It is Gajendra’s dream to create, support, coach, and guide at least a dozen successful entrepreneurs.

cards.title: Girish Rao
cards.designation: Former CEO, ESSAR Steel Middle East

children.value:
Former CEO, ESSAR Steel Middle East

Girish Rao has more than 35 years of experience in the fields of consumer durables, steel, and retail. An MMS graduate from BHU, he worked with BPL where he had a successful stint, ending as Head of Sales. Then he joined LG Electronics as Vice President of Sales and Marketing, where he drove market expansion taking the brand to the leading position in all categories in India.

Later as CEO of ESSAR Steel Hypermart, he set up a first-of-its-kind retail business for steel, catering to the MSME sector. This model became a pioneering benchmark in the steel industry and set new standards.

As CEO for ESSAR Steel Middle East in Dubai, he increased the company’s presence in the GCC and Iraq. Currently, he is a consultant and has set up INSALESPRO, a community for the sales fraternity in the country. Girish is an avid traveler, reader and golfer.

cards.title: Madhukar Kamath
cards.designation: Chairman Emeritus, DDB Mudra Group

children.value: Madhukar has over four decades of experience in the area of Marketing Services, Media & Advertising. He was the Group CEO and MD of the DDB Mudra Group, India’s leading integrated marketing communications group. He also served as the Chairman of Interbrand (the world’s leading brand consultancy) in India. Madhukar has led several industry bodies. He has been the President of AAAI and Chairman of ASCI. He is currently the Chairman of ABC. He serves of the Board of Music Broadcast India (RadioCity). He is the recipient of the Lifetime Achievement Award. His commitment to the cause of Children and the Girl Child with Plan India has led to his appointment to the Global Board of Plan International recently. Madhukar was also the Chairman of the Mudra Foundation and the Governing Council of MICA, India’s foremost business school for Strategic Marketing and Communications Management.

cards.title: Murali Sivaraman
cards.designation: Chairman/Board Director; Former President, Philips Lighting (Growth Markets)

children.value: Murali Sivaraman is an accomplished business leader, who has worked in India, Singapore, China, Canada and London. He is presently a Non-Executive Chairman and Independent Director of Huhtamaki PPL Ltd, Independent Director in Bharat Forge Limited and ICICI Lombard General Insurance Co. Limited. In his previous role, he served as President of Philips Lighting, Growth Markets, based in Singapore. During his tenure at Philips, he has successfully completed and integrated large acquisitions in India, China and the Middle East. He also worked with Akzo Nobel (formerly ICI) for nearly 20 years in global positions. He has more than three decades of experience in building brands/channel for fast-moving electrical/decorative goods across the world. He is a Chartered Accountant, Cost and Works Accountant and holds a Post Graduate Diploma in Management from the Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad. He has also completed Advanced Management Program from Harvard Business School.

cards.title: Nandakumar K Nair
cards.designation: Founder and CEO, SunTec Business Solutions

children.value:
Nandakumar K Nair (NK), is the Founder and CEO of SunTec Business Solutions, leaders in revenue management and business assurance solutions. With nearly three-and-a-half decades of experience in the banking, telecom, retail and travel industry, he has shaped customer-centric software platforms and products for pricing and billing across these transaction-intensive verticals. He is credited with building the first automated billing solution for India’s national telecom provider.

He has pioneered and patented the concept of real-time value-chain management in digital business ecosystems and has contributed in evolving the relationship-based pricing philosophy for banking – now acknowledged as the key to balanced pricing dynamics.

A widely read writer, he has written for several technology newsletters and blogs and spoken at various technology and industry thought leadership summits. He is associated with industry forums such as CII, NASSCOM and TiE and is also a keen mentor of start-ups and entrepreneurs.

cards.title: Prabhakar Tadepalli
cards.designation: Co-Founder, President and COO, Tyfone Inc.

children.value:
As Co-Founder, President and COO of Tyfone Inc, Prabhakar is responsible for all product and business development aspects of Tyfone in the Asia-Pacific region. A seasoned technology executive, he is instrumental in shaping and directing company strategy. Tyfone specializes in identity security, privacy protection and cyber safety products for Government, Financial Services and Healthcare among other domains.

Tyfone operates in the US, Asia-Pacific, Middle-East and Africa markets. The Company’s growth and reputation are a testament to Prabhakar’s vast domain knowledge and his keen perception of industry-specific identity security and data protection needs.
Prior to establishing Tyfone, Prabhakar was Founder CEO of Finatus, a venture-backed cloud-services company which was one of the earliest companies in the space to target the industrial SME markets in the US.

cards.title: Rachna Aggarwal
cards.designation: Founder Partner, 92 Angels; Former CEO, Indus League (a brand division of Future Lifestyle Fashion)

children.value:
Rachna is a founder partner at 92Angels, a nurture seed capital fund and a mentor/advisor to many young entrepreneurs.

At 92Angels, she looks for deep science/ deep tech paradigm-changing ideas of first-time graduate entrepreneurs to mentor and invest in.

She has 25 years of rich experience in brand building in the fashion industry being the promoter founder of Indus-League and then CEO of the lifestyle brand business of the Future Group.

She did her schooling at Loreto House and her B Sc (Economics) from St. Xavier’s College, Kolkata followed by her PGDM from IIM, Ahmedabad.

Rachna is married to Arun Sirdeshmukh and they have two daughters Riya (21) and Risha (16). She loves to travel, play mahjongg, binge on television serials or get creative by making candles and doing pottery or decoupage.

cards.title: Rajeev Mecheri
cards.designation: Managing Director, Mecheri Smart Capital Pvt Ltd

children.value:
Has over 25 years of experience in “Smart building” technologies and solutions. Co-founded & built “iMetrex Group” which included India’s leading Security, Safety & Building Automation company - DATS, a product distribution business – Vista, and an Irish technology business Europlex. Siemens acquired 100% of the group in December 2009.

Currently involved in growing the interests of Mecheri Holdings in the Real Estate Tech & Aviation Tech, Joint Ventures with global corporations for South Asia market and investing in early stage technology start up's. With an active involvement in the not for profit sector for over 25 years through Mecheri Foundation, his current passion is to build a giving platform by delivering business value for e-commerce brands.

He is the Honorary Consul for Ireland, Member of the board of Management of Krea University, Trustee and Founder Director of Chennai International Centre, Founder President of EO Chennai & Former Regional Chair of YPO South Asia

cards.title: Satyakam Arya
cards.designation: Managing Director & CEO, Daimler India Commercial Vehicles

children.value: Satyakam Arya is the Managing Director & CEO of Daimler Truck operations in India since end of 2018. Under his stewardship, DICV continues to grow as a strong, progressive and transformational player in the domestic market with the made-for-India commercial vehicle brand ‘BharatBenz’. In his career with Daimler, Satyakam has aggressively expanded export operations of other Daimler Truck brands including Mercedes-Benz, FUSO and Freightliner in over 60 markets worldwide.
Prior to this, Satyakam worked in Tokyo, Japan as Head of Customer Services & Procurement for Daimler Truck Asia.

With over 25 years of experience across the automotive value chain in various OEMs, Satyakam believes in leading with a long-term vision to achieve profitability and scale with complete integrity and empower his team to create solutions to achieve sustainable results. His core competencies include Strategic Sourcing, Project Management, Partner Management, Leadership development and Business transformation.
He holds a Bachelors of Engineering in Mechanical Studies and has completed the Senior Management Program for Executives (Strategy and Operations) at IIM Kolkata in 2010.

Satyakam is deeply engaged with industry associations, being chairman of CII Tamil Nadu for FY 2022-'23. He is currently a member of the Executive Council of SIAM (Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers).
He was honoured as the "CV Man of the Year 2020" at the Apollo CV awards and recognized as "CEO of the Year 2022" by The Machinist, part of Worldwide Media, Bennett Coleman – The Times Group.

cards.title: Rakesh Malhotra
cards.designation: Founder of SAR Group, Luminous, Livpure, Livguard and Ncubate Capital

children.value: Rakesh Malhotra is the Founder of the SAR Group and Luminous Power Technologies. He is a serial entrepreneur since 1988 and an early stage investor in India, Singapore and the US. SAR Group companies are engaged in a wide range of industries including power electronics, energy storage, renewable energy, water and air purification, industrial IOT etc. Rakesh also serves as the Managing Partner of Ncubate Capital Partners, which invests in early stage companies in India from an open-ended balance sheet fund. A graduate from Jadavpur University India in Electronics & Telecom Engineering, he started his career in 1983 at NELCO (Tata Group) followed by Mitsui and Siemens. Since 1988, he has been a Founder/Co-Founder of 14 ventures and has exited 8 of these. These companies currently employ more than 9,000 people and have combined revenues of close to USD 1 billion. He actively mentors many startups in India and Singapore and keenly interacts with engineering and B school students to develop their interest in entrepreneurship. He serves on various industrial/technology committees in India and presents papers at engineering conferences. He is a family person and has an avid interest in traveling, playing cricket, music and business reading.

cards.title: Ravi Kirpalani
cards.designation: Independent Director and Chairman, Foseco India Ltd; Former Managing Director and CEO, ThyssenKrupp

children.value:
Ravi is currently the Managing Director and CEO of ThyssenKrupp India. Prior to this, he was the Managing Director of Castrol India.
Ravi brings over 34 years of experience in sales, marketing, strategy development and as a CEO of a large and successful listed company.
He has worked with global and culturally diverse teams and led major transformational programs. Ravi has a deep passion for customer relationships, building brands and developing people. He enjoys engaging and energizing people and helping build a culture based on values.
Ravi has lived in the UK, Middle East and India and worked with the leadership teams in many countries. A strong advocate of diversity and inclusion, he brings a global mindset and is completely at ease in working with different cultures and in matrixed organizations.
Ravi studied Economics at St Stephen’s College Delhi and has an MBA from IIM Kolkata.

cards.title: Shalini Kamath
cards.designation: Founder and CEO, SK & Associates

children.value:
Shalini Kamath is a Certified and practicing CEO & Leadership Coach, focusing on Change and Transformation journeys of individuals and organizations. She also works in the area of Leadership Development and Diversity & Inclusion initiatives across organizations.

Shalini is an Independent Director on the Boards of Borosil Glassworks Ltd. and Graphite India. She is on the Advisory Board of TRAAIN and the Past Chairperson for FICCI – Women on Corporate Boards Mentorship program.

Passionate about Human Resources having led the function at ChevronTexaco, Star, KPMG and Ambit, she also has a deep understanding of Marketing and Corporate Communications having worked in these fields with Raytheon and Ambit.

Shalini began her working career in Zambia and Botswana in Southern Africa with over a decade+ experience in tripartite partnership projects.

An MBA graduate from Edinburgh Business School, UK, trained at Harvard Business School in Change and Transformation, a certified Zenger Folkman facilitator, a sought after speaker, she is a firm believer in continuous renewal to remain relevant in today’s fast changing world.

cards.title: Shashi Shekhar
cards.designation: Managing Director, Camfil India

children.value: Shashi Shekhar is a business leader and a strategic thinker with more than 28 years of experience in the field of Industrial, Government, and Consumer Business. He has held several leadership positions in companies like Sandvik, 3M & DuPont. Currently serving as the Managing Director of Camfil India (A Swedish MNC and Global Leader in Air Filtration), is responsible for leading the Clean Air Business for India, Sri Lanka, and Bangladesh. He is passionate about making ‘Clean air a human right’. A Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering from BIT Sindri and IIM Bangalore alumni has accomplished several professional enhancement programs including Six Sigma DMAIC, DFSS, Leadership Development. Over these years, Mr. Shekhar has been awarded numerous prestigious industry awards and recognized in several industry-leading publications including Forbes, Industry Outlook, CEO Insights, and many more. With the firm belief in youth being the country’s future, Shekhar has mentored several students and held various advisory positions with numerous startups. Presently, Shashi is an advisor on AI for Ikigai Labs, an initiative of IIT Kanpur.

cards.title: Sunil Buch
cards.designation: Co-Founder and CEO, Wellness Niyamas

children.value:
Sunil Buch is a versatile and multi-talented leader. He has over two decades of leadership and general management experience spanning FMCG, Advertising, Telecom, Retail and the Media & Entertainment sectors. He has served and contributed in leadership roles at Colgate — Palmolive, Johnson & Johnson, Leo Burnett, Marico, Reliance Communications and ZEE Entertainment Enterprises Limited where he was the CEO of Zee Live and Zee Talent. In 2017, he crafted one of the most interesting partnerships between Zee & Rally for Rivers, which gave one of the best advertising films for the rally.

Currently, he is the Co-Founder and CEO of Wellness Niyamas, a innovative healthcare start up, and is also Non-Executive Independent Director on Board of Orbit Exports, a listed company. He specializes in creating profitable brand-led businesses via thought leadership, entrepreneurial problem-solving, creative strategy and execution. Happy People make Happy Products & Services and the PAT principle are the two tenets he strongly propagates and believes in. Sunil is a science graduate and MBA from Mumbai University.

cards.title: M.S. Unnikrishnan
cards.designation: CEO, IITB-Monash Research Academy

children.value: Mr. M. S. Unnikrishnan (Unny) is the CEO of IITB-Monash Research Academy, a research institute dedicated to a PhD program in cutting edge technologies and management, jointly promoted by IIT Bombay and the Monash University of Australia. He has previously held the position of M.D. & CEO of Thermax Group for over 13 years and played a pivotal role in the growth, professionalisation and globalisation of the company.

He serves on KEC International and Azure Power Limited boards. He is also a trustee of “Akshaya Patra,” the largest NGO of India that feeds 19 lakhs/ day underprivileged school children, and Jehangir Hospital, Pune.
Mr. Unnikrishnan chairs the Central Mechanical Engineering Research Institute (CMERI), Durgapur, and is a member of the Governing Councils of TERI and Army Institute of Technology.
He is also associated with the Government of India as:

– Co-Chairperson of “Srijan” program for SIDBI-TIFAC for start-up funding
– Member, Apex Council, Prime Minister’s Doctoral Research Fellowship
– Director of the Technology Innovation Hub, IIT Palakkad
– Expert committee member, SAIF Centres, Ministry of Science & Tech, GOI
– Expert committee member, SATHI program, Ministry of Science & Tech, GOI

A graduate in Mechanical Engineering from VNIT, Nagpur, he has also completed his Advanced Management Program from the Harvard Business School, Boston, USA. He continues to be a keen student of energy, environment, and management.

cards.title: Pranay Dhabhai
cards.designation: Founder and Former Whole Time Director, Haier Appliances India Pvt Ltd

children.value: Founder and Former Whole Time Director, Haier Appliances India Pvt. Ltd.

cards.title: Jacob Mathew
cards.designation: CEO, Industree Crafts

children.value: Jacob is the CEO of Industree Foundation, and is Co-Founder of Tessaract Design, Idiom Design, Dovetail Furniture and Spring Health Water (india) Pvt Ltd. Jacob works at the intersection of Design, Business, Capital and Impact enterprises and is a design Principal at the Impact Edge Lab at Srishti Institute of Art Design and Technology. Jacob spent the first part of his life transforming business through design and intends to spend the next transforming society through business.

cards.title: Anupama Joshi
cards.designation: Former Partner, Deloitte & Touche

cards.title: Gagan Adlakha
cards.designation: Leadership Coach and Senior Partner, Vyaktitva

children.value:
Helping create conscious leaders, leadership teams, and organizations.Gagan is a Leadership Coach and a specialist in the area of Leadership Development and people performance with about 30 years of experience. An XLRI 1990 alumnus, Gagan joined the IT sector in its high growth phase and handled a variety of roles covering the complete gamut of the HR function for about 10 years. He rounded off his corporate experience by handling business roles for the next few years.

Gagan turned entrepreneur in 2004 and joined Vyaktitva as a partner with the desire to help enhance people’s performance across organizations. Gagan has been working on various Coaching, Organizational Design, and Learning & Development assignments focussed on enhancing individual and organizational performance. He has designed and delivered solutions for premier organizations including the Max group, PepsiCo, Amex, Unilever, Colgate, Airtel, Genpact, Tata AIA, Hewitt, Whirlpool, Accenture, Interglobe group, GE, ITC, Hero, RB, Mother Dairy, Ericsson, Cap Gemini, Jubilant, Viacom18, Aditya Birla Group, Godrej, CK Birla Group, Star India, CapitaLand, and IBM. His experience has been across countries, cultures, levels, and industries.

He has also done extensive work with owner/ proprietor/ family-run businesses, partnerships, and volunteers regularly for social sector organizations. In addition, Gagan is currently focusing on areas such as wellness, yoga, holistic living, meditation, mindfulness, and helping develop conscious leaders and organizations.

cards.title: Mythily Ramesh
cards.designation: Co-Founder and CEO, NextWealth

children.value: Mythily has more than 30 years of experience in her career. She completed her BE Computer Science from College of Engineering, Guindy and MBA from IIM Ahmedabad. In her 20 year successful stint in Wipro she grew from a Customer support executive to a Senior Vice President. Her career spans product management, marketing, Business Head and Quality. As a certified Black Belt she drove the Six Sigma initiative in Wipro and was successful in moving the organization from 1.7 Sigma to 4.7 Sigma and reducing the order to collection cycle from 365 days + to 120 days. With a passion for entrepreneurship, she was the CEO of a start up in Wipro called 01markets and built a successful business around e-procurement and was a pioneer in Reverse Auctions in India. She is a certified CPM and CPIM specialist. She then moved to the Corporate office to handle Mergers & Acquisitions, Business Development and Innovation. As part of Innovation she seeded multiple new service areas which have grown into 100+ million dollar business for Wipro. In her last stint in Wipro as Senior VP for Wipro BPO, she was responsible for pre-sales and solutioning, product management, transition, platform BPO, BPO Consulting and procurement BPO operations. Her target was to build the business revenue – increase the back-office business from 5% to 35 % which she did in three years timeframe and also brought in 300 million dollars of business for the division. In 2006 and 2007 she was adjudged one of the 25 most Powerful women in India by India Today and Dataquest. In February,2023 she was given the ET-Ascent Business leader of the Year award. She has also been the recipient of the Distinguished Alumni award by College of Engineering Guindy during their 225 years anniversary celebration. In 2010 she and a few ex-Wipro colleagues started a social entrepreneurship firm NextWealth focusing on AI/ML data services, back office and IT services from small towns in a unique distributed delivery model. Their mission is to create 10000 jobs in the small towns. She is currently the Co-Founder and CEO of NextWealth. She serves on the board of Karnataka Bank and is the Chairperson of their IT and Digital committee, and is a member of the Nomination and compensation committee. She is also a Director on the subsidiary of Karnataka bank KBL Services Ltd. She is a member of the Board of Governors of Indian Institute of Management, Udaipur. She is a member of the Nasscom BPM Council and heads a Task Force focusing on moving the IT/BPO industry to set up delivery centres in small towns. She retired as an Independent Director from WEP solutions Ltd and WEP Digital after serving on the board for eight years. She served as a member and as an office bearer of the Steering committee of IIMPACT for eight years, an NGO started by IIMA Alumni focusing on educating the underprivileged girl child in India. She is married with two boys and pursues painting, music and yoga in her free time.

cards.title: Hema Annamalai
cards.designation: Co-Founder and Vice Chair, Green Collar Agritech Solutions Pvt Ltd.

children.value:
Hema is the Co-Founder and Vice Chairman of Green Collar Agritech Solutions Pvt Ltd, a company that enhances the livelihood of Small and Marginal Farmers (SMF). Green Collar makes customised quality grading systems for all the stakeholders of the agri value chain, by harnessing powerful technologies of AI/ML in crop production and post harvest processing solutions.

Hema was the founder and former CEO of Ampere Vehicles, an early mover that spearheaded India’s E-Vehicles revolution. Ampere has carved a niche for itself as an innovative technology creator in the Indian Electric Vehicle Industry, contributing to environmental sustainability. Ampere has been acquired and Hema has fully exited the venture.

A serial entrepreneur, Hema has spent the last 25 years creating and driving varied entrepreneurial ventures spanning Professional Services, Electronics, Skill Development and Automobiles.

Hema strongly promotes Job Creation and focusses on Women empowerment. She also invests and mentors Innovative disruptive startups from smaller cities that solves societal problems.

Hema is the past chair of TiE ( The Indus Entrepreneurs) Women program, a global initiative of TiE that embrace, engage and empower Women. She was the Former President of TiE Coimbatore. Hema is also the Founder of Uni Connect Pte Ltd, Singapore.

Hema is the Founding Patron of Society for Smart E-Mobility (SSEM), Coimbatore.

Hema holds an MBA from Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology, Australia and a Bachelors degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Government College of Technology, Coimbatore.

cards.title: Sridhar Dharmrajan
cards.designation: EVP and MD, Hexagon Manufacturing Intelligence

children.value: CEO, MD and Strategy Leader with 30+ years of experience in successfully creating, growing, transforming and dramatically improving P&Ls/businesses. Successfully started, built and established multiple MNCs and start-ups in India over 3 decades in the ‘technology’ domain. Selected and retained the best-fit talent, coached and developed leaders. Collaboratively finds purpose in line with organizational goals. A people leader who continues to demonstrate his widely acknowledged skill and prowess in inspiring teams to work at the highest level of passion with a relentless result-oriented mindset. Excels at integrating insights towards a purposeful future of the business, and provides a platform for people to accomplish their goals. Operates with a ‘customer-centric’ approach with the ability to build compelling relationships with CxOs. Focuses on the strengths of the team in a way that has helped in maximizing and creating sustainable growth. Highly proficient in driving digital innovation and bridging the gap between existing industrial environments and emerging new technologies. Known for taking on challenging assignments and utilizing deep experience in the automotive, aerospace, defence and machinery sectors to drive innovative customer solutions and outperform the competition. 𝗚𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 r𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱 e𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗲 in innovative global product strategies, IoT, machine learning, AI, asset performance management, big data, edge computing, mobility and cloud-based technologies. Adept in complex operations/financials, smart manufacturing and organizational/business turnarounds. 𝗔𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗲𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗲: P&L Growth • Digital Innovation • Digital Thought Leadership • Strategic Planning • Product Line Leadership • Industrial Internet • Internet of Things (IoT) • New Product Rollouts • Technology Turn-Around Expertise • Cost-Cutting Initiatives • Software Thought Leadership • Cloud and SaaS Business • Certified Solution Selling • Award Winning Business Leadership

cards.title: Nagesh Basavanhalli
cards.designation: Group CEO, Greaves Cotton Limited

children.value: Nagesh A. Basavanhalli was appointed as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the company in September 2016. Since then, he has led the transformation of the company with profitable growth, unlocking higher value for the shareholders. As a Global Leader, Cleantech Enthusiast and Corporate Strategist, he is responsible for the company’s growth strategy in India and abroad. Under his leadership, Greaves Cotton Limited has signed strategic partnerships and alliances reinforcing the company’s positioning as India’s leading last-mile transportation, solutions and services company. Nagesh has core expertise in developing the strategic vision and technology roadmap, thereby leveraging brand potential, improving the top-line and bottom-line of the business. With over 20 years of experience, Nagesh is a Global Automotive Executive with the experience of leading companies to transform, grow in terms of overall market value and strengthen worldwide presence. Nagesh has been instrumental in bringing the best technology and people to create winning brands. He believes that companies can work closely with communities to drive higher economic value and develop sustainable solutions for the world. Prior to his appointment at Greaves Cotton Limited, he has been associated with Fiat Chrysler Automobiles for over two decades, last serving as the Managing Director and President of Fiat Group Automobiles India. He joined Chrysler in 1994 and has held numerous positions of increasing responsibility in engineering and product planning. He has also been associated with the ATG Group as the Group President for emerging markets. He was awarded the “Booth India Business Leader — 2009” by Chicago Booth Business School. Nagesh holds a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering from Bangalore University and a Master of Science from the University of Texas. He holds an MBA from the University of Chicago Business School.

children.value: More than 200 CEOs, CxOs, and entrepreneurs experientially imbibed the DNA of Success from three iconic business leaders and Sadhguru. Participants also received mentoring from 25 Resource Leaders. Here are some glimpses from Isha INSIGHT 2022.

video.title: Narayana Murthy @INSIGHT: Entrepreneurs Matter For India
Ratan Tata on expanding your business @ INSIGHT
OLA CEO Bhavish Aggarwal Shares His Entrepreneurial Journey
Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw: What Does it Take to Be an Entrepreneur?

children.value: leadership@ishainsight.org

faqs.question: What is the “INSIGHT: The DNA of Success” program?

children.value: INSIGHT is an immersive business leadership program offered by the Isha Leadership Academy. It is designed to enhance leadership capabilities and foster personal growth through a unique blend of inner transformation, skill-building, networking, and experiential learning.

faqs.question: Who can attend the program?

children.value: The program is designed to cater to a diverse range of individuals from various professional backgrounds. It is best suited for the following participants:
CEOs (Chief Executive Officers)
CxOs/C-suite Executives (e.g., CFOs, CTOs, CMOs, etc.)
Business Owners
SME (Small and Medium-sized Enterprise) Owners and Leaders
Start-up Founders and Entrepreneurs
Senior Leaders in established organizations
Young Leaders who are preparing to lead teams or organizations in the near future
The program aims to empower these individuals with valuable insights, leadership skills, and personal development tools to enhance their effectiveness and impact in their respective fields.

faqs.question: Will Sadhguru be present at the program?

children.value: Yes, Sadhguru will personally conduct a couple of sessions for the participants. His presence and guidance are a significant aspect of the program, as he shares profound insights on leadership, personal growth, and inner transformation.

Sadhguru's insights and wisdom are known to have a deep impact on participants, inspiring them to explore their full potential as leaders and human beings. His sessions are the highlight of the program, providing participants with a unique opportunity to learn directly from one of the most influential voices of our times.

faqs.question: Will participants have one-on-one meetings with Sadhguru during the program?

children.value: While the program provides an invaluable opportunity to learn directly from Sadhguru, the sessions are conducted in a group setting. Sadhguru graciously opens the floor for questions, and participants are encouraged to raise their hands if they have a query. Volunteers will assist by bringing a microphone to you, allowing you to ask your question in the group setting. However, one-on-one meetings with Sadhguru are not a part of the program.
Please note that the group interactions offer a unique chance to benefit from Sadhguru's wisdom and insights collectively, fostering a shared learning experience for all participants.

faqs.question: What are the key highlights of the INSIGHT program?

children.value: Real-life case studies of iconic business leaders, facilitated by experienced Resource Leaders.
Networking opportunities with a highly accomplished peer group.
Transformational tools and processes imparted by Sadhguru and the Isha Leadership Academy for inner development and balance.

faqs.question: How long is the INSIGHT program?

children.value: INSIGHT is a three-and-a-half-day residential retreat, designed for participants to fully immerse themselves and experience its transformative impact.

faqs.question: Is there any specific prerequisite to attend the program?

children.value: No, there are no specific prerequisites for INSIGHT. It is open to all individuals who are interested in personal and leadership development, scaling up their business, and networking with other impactful leaders.

faqs.question: Where are the program sessions conducted?

children.value: INSIGHT is held at the Isha Yoga Center in Coimbatore, India. The center offers a serene and conducive environment to gain new insights, delve into new ideas, introspect, and connect with co-participants.

faqs.question: How can I apply for the program?

children.value: To apply, please fill out this registration form.

faqs.question: Who attends the program?

children.value: Each year, INSIGHT attracts over 220 leaders, entrepreneurs, and intrapreneurs from organizations with turnovers ranging from INR 10 crores to INR 5000+ crores, spanning diverse industries.

faqs.question: What is the last date to avail of the Early Bird offer?

children.value: The Early Bird offer is available for limited seats only and is therefore subject to availability of seats.

faqs.question: Can two discount offers be clubbed together?

children.value: No, two discount offers cannot be clubbed.

faqs.question: How can I pay?

children.value: You can pay online using a debit card/credit card. Alternately, Indian participants can also pay through NEFT/RTGS bank transfer while overseas participants can pay through Wire Transfer.

faqs.question: Is financial assistance available for INSIGHT?

children.value: No, financial assistance is not currently available for any of Isha Leadership Academy's programs.

faqs.question: Is there any discount for start-ups or budding entrepreneurs?

children.value: The exhaustive list of discounts can be referred to here.

faqs.question: Is accommodation provided during the INSIGHT program?

children.value: Yes, accommodation is provided at the Isha Yoga Center on an individual-occupancy basis as part of the program. The Isha Yoga Center offers comfortable and clean residential facilities to ensure a conducive environment for learning and inner exploration.

faqs.question: Will the accommodation be on a shared basis?

children.value: The accommodation will be provided on an individual-occupancy basis.

faqs.question: How do I reach the Isha Yoga Center for the program?

children.value: Complimentary pick-up and drop-off services are included in the program. We offer transportation to and from anywhere within Coimbatore city limits, including the airport, railway station, and bus stand.

faqs.question: What should I bring with me to the program?

children.value: Participants are advised to bring traditional Indian clothes or smart casuals for leadership sessions, and loose and comfortable attire for Yoga sessions. Additionally, remember to bring personal items like prescribed medications, chargers for electronic devices, and business cards for networking. Please carry a pair of trekking or sports shoes in case a short trek is planned.

faqs.question: Who is a Key Resource Leader? Can I ask questions to the Key Resource Leader?

children.value: A Key Resource Leader (KRL) is a highly accomplished industrialist and a prominent speaker in the INSIGHT program. During the program, the program host will conduct a session with each KRL to delve into their journey of success and share insights with the audience. Participants will have the opportunity to engage in a Q&A session with the KRLs. Notable past KRLs have included personalities like Ratan Tata (Chairman Emeritus, Tata Sons), Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw (Chairperson & Founder, Biocon), and Narayana Murthy (Co-Founder, Infosys), among others.

faqs.question: Who is a Resource Leader? Can I ask questions to the Resource Leader?

children.value: Resource Leaders are highly experienced individuals from diverse industries who offer valuable insights and guidance during the Insight program. Throughout the program, a Resource Leader will be assigned to your table, allowing you the chance for one-on-one interactions. They will guide you through sessions and various workshop-style activities, allowing you to ask questions and seek their expertise. Recent Resource Leaders include notable professionals like Madhukar Kamath (Executive Chairman, DDB Mudra Group) and Gajendra Chandel (Former President, Tata Motors).

faqs.question: Who is a Speaker? Can I ask questions to the Speaker?

children.value: A Speaker is an experienced individual with expertise in a particular field, offering insights on topics such as disruption, scaling up, innovation, and more. Speakers bring valuable learning to participants. For instance, in Insight 2022, Gautam Saraogi (CEO & Founder, GoColors!) discussed his successful efforts to diversify his business and establish innovative distribution channels in the textile industry. Participants have the opportunity to ask questions to the Speaker during a Q&A session following their presentation.

faqs.question: Is the INSIGHT program affiliated with any particular religion or belief system?

children.value: No, INSIGHT is not affiliated with any specific religion or belief system. It is an all-inclusive program focused on personal growth, leadership development, scaling up one’s business and enhancing one's overall wellbeing.

faqs.question: Can I attend the INSIGHT program more than once?

children.value: Yes, participants who have already attended the program are welcome to attend it again. Many participants find value in revisiting the program to reinforce their learning and gain fresh insights.

faqs.question: What languages are the INSIGHT program sessions conducted in?

children.value: The program is conducted in English.

faqs.question: Is the INSIGHT program certified or accredited?

children.value: INSIGHT is a unique offering by the Isha Leadership Academy. It does not have official certification or accreditation from external educational institutions. Nevertheless, it is widely recognized for its profound impact on leadership and personal development. Upon completion, you will receive a certificate of participation.

faqs.question: What is the process to cancel or transfer my registration?

children.value: Refund, Cancellation, and Substitution Policy:
Substitution of your registration with another participant is permitted without additional charges.
Your request for cancellation / substitution should be sent in writing to leadership@ishainsight.org and is subject to approval.
Cancellation requests made on or before 10 October 2023 will result in a refund of 90% of the program fees you have paid.
Cancellation requests received between 11 October and 30 October 2023 will result in a refund of 50% of the program fees.
No refunds will be provided for cancellation requests received after 30 October 2023.
Please ensure the accuracy of the invoice details before submitting the form, since they will be used to generate the invoice. Once generated, the invoice cannot be altered.

allIlaLandingPages.summary: Led by Sadhguru, the program is an intense and joyful/exuberant exploration of how to enhance one’s ability to “see,” the most essential ingredient to lead business growth and expansion.

sectionContent.title: Key Resource Leaders and Speakers at Insight 2023

children.value: A rare opportunity to imbibe the essence of successfully scaling up businesses from industry stalwarts.

cards.title: Bhavish Aggarwal
cards.designation: Founder & CEO, Ola

children.value:
Bhavish Aggarwal is the Founder & CEO of Ola, one of the world’s largest ride-sharing platforms and India’s most popular mobile app for transportation. With the mission of building mobility for a billion people, he started Ola (formerly OlaCabs) in 2010 with Ankit Bhati, a fellow alumnus from the Indian
Institute of Technology in Mumbai, the country’s premier institution for technology and science.
Before Ola, Bhavish worked with Microsoft Research for two years, filing two patents alongside having three papers published in international academic journals.

Ola is now one of India’s most valuable and respected new economy organization with 10,00,000 driver partners in over 110+ cities. The company offers 14 services across diverse categories including business-class vehicles, shared transport and auto rickshaws. With over a billion rides annually, Ola is a true blue Indian unicorn which believes in responsible consumption with shared transportation key to that agenda. True to this spirit, Bhavish doesn’t own a car and vows that he never will.

As a rapidly-growing organization that nurtures the spirit of innovation and entrepreneurship, Ola took the first big step in spreading its wings outside of India with the launch in Australia in early 2018, followed by its entry in UK. This move is line with Ola’s vision of solving globally relevant problems with hyperlocal solutions.
Honors and Recognition:

• Entrepreneur of the Year – Economic Times

• Disruptor of the Year, Asia Business Leader Awards – CNBC-TV18

• Unicorn of the Year – NDTV

• Young Turks e-Vangelist – CNBC-TV18

• 30under30 – Forbes India

• Startup of the Year – Business Standard

• Mobility Leader – Express IT Awards

• Startup of the Year – Economic Times

• Leadership Award for Outstanding Startup – Forbes India

• Consumer Internet Company of the Year – VCCircle

• Global Growth Companies – World Economic Forum

• Innovation in Transportation Award – Frost and Sullivan

cards.title: Shri. S. Somanath
cards.designation: Chairman, Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO)

children.value:
Shri. Somanath, a distinguished scientist, is the current chairperson of the Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO), the premier space agency of India. He was appointed to this position in January 2022.

Prior to this, he was the director of the Vikram Sarabhai Space Centre. He also held the positions of Director of the Liquid Propulsion Systems Centre. While he was the Project Director of the GSLV Mk-III Launch Vehicle, their first experimental mission was successfully accomplished in 2014.

Shri. Somanath obtained B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering from TKM College of Engineering, Kollam, and Masters in Aerospace Engineering from Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. He joined VSSC in 1985 and was a team leader for the Integration of PSLV during the early phases.

He is the recipient of the ‘Space Gold Medal’ from the Astronautical Society of India. He received the ‘Merit Award” and ‘Performance Excellence award’ from ISRO and a ‘Team excellence award’ for GSLV Mk-III development.

He is a Fellow of the Indian National Academy of Engineering (INAE), a Fellow of the Aeronautical Society of India (AeSI), Astronautical Society of India (ASI), and a Corresponding Member of the International Academy of Astronautics (IAA). He is in the bureau of the International Astronautical Federation (IAF) and a recipient of the National Aeronautics Prize from the Aeronautical Society of India (ASI).

cards.title: Rajeev Chandrasekhar
cards.designation: Minister of State for Skill Development and Entrepreneurship and Electronics and Information Technology of India

children.value:
Shri Rajeev Chandrasekhar is the Union Minister of State for Electronics and Information Technology and Union Minister of State for Skill Development and Entrepreneurship.

He is an Indian politician and entrepreneur, technocrat and serving his third term as a Member of Parliament in the upper house (Rajya Sabha) from BJP representing Karnataka. He also served as National Spokesperson of BJP and was vice-chairman of the Kerala wing of the BJP-led coalition National Democratic Alliance.

For causes he believes in and supports, Shri Rajeev Chandrasekhar has apart from raising them in Parliament, actively approached the courts to intervene on behalf of citizens as in the case of Section 66A of the IT Act, securing voting rights for members of the Armed Forces among other issues. He is widely recognized as the most informed and active MP on Digital India, Internet and Technology issues, Spectrum Allocation, Net Neutrality, Consumer rights in cyber space policies and other regulatory matters.

It was his relentless campaign and later a petition in the Supreme Court that led to Armed Forces personnel getting the right to vote in their place of posting in the 2014 General Elections and further electoral reforms to bring the facility of e-Postal Ballot to Armed Forces. After the Uri Terror attack in September 2016, he was the first MP in India to have challenged the MFN status granted to Pakistan and submitted a Private Member's Bill in the Rajya Sabha on 18 November 2016 titled: "The Declaration of Countries as Sponsor of Terrorism Bill, 2016".

In February 2016, Rajeev was felicitated by the General Officer Commanding-in- Chief, Western Command, Lt Gen KJ Singh, PVSM, AVSM (Bar) with the GOC-in- C Commendation Card at HQ Western Command, Chandigarh for his support and work for the Armed Forces, veterans, and their families.

Additionally, he has focused on and taken up a wide array of macro-economic and micro-economic issues that include restructuring of Public Sector Banks, creating Transparency in the management of Public Assets and repairing key sectors in the economy to revive growth amongst others.
