Since Vinita joined Britannia as CEO in 2005, the company almost doubled its turnover in just four years, growing at an annual rate of 23%, as compared to the previous three years’ 10-11% growth. She has led Britannia’s charge beyond its core biscuits business into categories such as dairy and bakery, and moved into international markets with Britannia’s range of products. She received her Bachelor’s Degree in Economics from LSR at the University of Delhi and her MBA at the Jamnalal Bajaj Institute of Management Studies at Bombay University. She pursued postgraduate studies in Business and Economics at Michigan State University on a scholarship from The Rotary Foundation, and was selected to work as a Graduate Intern at the United Nations headquarters in New York. She started her career with Voltas Ltd.-a Tata Group company focusing on consumer products, where she launched Rasna soft-drink concentrate. In 1980, Vinita joined Cadbury India. The Coca-Cola Company chose her as its worldwide Marketing Director in 1994 where she was responsible for the worldwide strategy for Coke. In 1997 she took over as Vice President of Marketing for Latin America, and in 1999 relocated to Chile as President of the Andean Division with sales in excess of US$1bn. In 2001, she was made a corporate officer of The Coca-Cola Company and appointed Vice President of Corporate Strategy reporting to the Chairman. After a nine-year association with Coke, Vinita joined her mentor at Coke, Sergio Zyman at the Zyman Group in July 2003 as a Managing Principal and Head of the Business Strategy practice in the company’s Atlanta office. As a member of the company’s Board of Managers, Vinita shared responsibility for developing and managing Zyman Group’s consulting business.

json.title: Subscription
json.description1: Monthly newsletter featuring leadership insights from Sadhguru and industry experts.
json.description2: Free access to the leadership ebook.
json.name: Full Name
json.thankyouDescription1: To complete your subscription, please check your Inbox for an email with the subject line “Please confirm your Monthly Newsletter subscription” and click the link to verify your email ID.
json.thankyouDescription2: If you do not find the email in your Primary Inbox, please check your Promotions or Spam folder and move the email to the Primary Inbox.

allIlaLandingPages.title: Isha Leadership Academy

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Established by Sadhguru, Yogi, mystic and visionary, Isha Leadership Academy offers the highest quality of leadership education by integrating external skill sets with tools for wellbeing.

, Yogi, mystic and visionary, Isha Leadership Academy offers
the highest quality of leadership education
by integrating external skill sets with tools for wellbeing.
intro-image
Isha Leadership Academy focuses on
cultivating leadership as an innate and intuitive process
– beyond strategies or techniques. Its guiding principle is the importance of first managing one’s own mind, body and energies in order to manage external situations and people.
Its aim is to
create leaders whose human potential has found fullest expression
, who are deeply rooted in their inner wellbeing and are able to operate from a sense of inclusiveness, resulting in more incisive actions and decisions.
Enhance your ability to “see” and explore the science of scaling up your business through real-life case studies of iconic business leaders.
Explore practical steps to unleash the human potential in your organization by seeing human beings as Possibilities instead of mere resources
Embark on a transformative journey of crafting lasting success and a legacy beyond mere profitability.

sectionContent.title: Family Enterprise Excellence - Mapping the Future of Your Business

children.value: Expand your business by leveraging the power of purposeful branding from India’s finest brand strategists
An unparalleled opportunity to connect with and receive mentoring from industry stalwarts
Hear Sadhguru’s unique perspective on leadership and business
3500+ highly-accomplished alumni that can offer invaluable insights and support throughout your growth journey
Empower yourself with tools for inner transformation so you can unleash your full potential
Founder, Infosys

Today, we have monumental challenges in India, which must be solved, so the next generation of Indians can live in a country where they can be happy. Creating such an India requires a huge leadership effort. I have no doubt at all that the Isha Leadership Academy will add tremendous value to India through its leadership programs.
Chairman and Managing Director, Biocon Limited
Let me say how delighted I'm to be here and that I could spend some time just looking at what Sadhguru has created here. And I think what Sadhguru has done here tells you about what is possible.
Founder Chairman, Apollo Hospitals
I must give my pranams to Sadhguru for having created an environment like this and trying to change the world. Thank you Sadhguru, and all of us have great admiration for what you are doing.
Chairman, National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development
There is a business context, there is an individual personal context and there is a context of inner dimension. It is entirely appropriate that someone like Sadhguru takes the lead in this sphere.
Former Managing Director, Britannia Industries Limited

"We really don't have a leadership academy in India [like Isha Leadership Academy]. We've got schools of management and schools that you can get a masters degree. But we really don't have anything that is focusing on leadership. I think this is what not just India requires but this is what I believe the world requires, a different model of leadership, a more inclusive leadership.
Business Advisor, Speaker, Author & Coach of Fortune 500 CEOs
Leaders build nations. Nations don't build themselves. This is an academy that is unique because you are learning from practical people.

“As a leader, your every thought, emotion, and action impacts many lives. It’s extremely important to work on how you are within yourself.”
“Leadership means partnership, cooperation, mentoring, and support. It does not mean dominance. Dominance is tyranny.”

The world’s largest people’s movement, which has united world leaders, visionaries, influencers and 4 billion citizens behind a common purpose - to Save Soil.

Sadhguru’s vision for education as a means to unfold every child’s innate genius has manifested in three distinct approaches - Isha Vidhya (for rural children), Isha Home School (a home-like residential school) and Isha Samskriti (a gurukul-style system).

Rally for Rivers, an awareness campaign to save India’s rivers, was supported by 162 million citizens. Cauvery Calling, its action-oriented offspring, aims to enable 5.2 million farmers to plant 2.42 billion trees to revitalize river Cauvery.
A pioneering social outreach initiative that seeks to transform the lives of India’s rural population, it has impacted over 11.3 million people in 7,500+ villages in southern India.

Sadhguru’s vision is to offer the science of inner wellbeing to all. Millions worldwide have benefited from the Yogic practices offered by Sadhguru. In 2022, Sadhguru’s videos were viewed over 3.5 billion times.

attributes.content: Through case studies, probing discussions and immersive working sessions, the program offers tools and actionable perspectives to participants to create conscious brands.

children.value: Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore
19 JAN - 21 JAN 2024
A three-day brand workshop envisioned by Sadhguru to help scale up your business
Unlock the power of branding through a unique interactive program that brings together India’s finest brand strategists
Decoding Branding

Brand Insight is not a speaker–led conference but an interactive workshop, where you will have the opportunity to learn and apply the concepts, and work with live cases to see how branding can be used to differentiate your product.
Through case studies
, probing discussions and immersive working sessions, the program offers tools and actionable perspectives to participants to create conscious brands.

sectionContent.quote: “Only if you build every bit of your brand Consciously, to reflect the nature of your work or product, will it be valuable.”

children.value: Brand & Innovation Expert, Storm the Norm Ventures; Independent Board Director
It's a collaborative process and one that is actually assisted by some of the sharpest brand minds in the industry and the country today.
Film Director; Creative Consultant; Former Chief Creative Officer, Ogilvy South and South East Asia; IAA Creative Leader of the Year

This program is an eye-opener to a world of possibilities for these young brand owners and future leaders. There was this very young, energetic, embracing crowd of participants coming from various parts of India, from various categories of industries that was not only soaking up a lot of knowledge, but imparting it also.
Group CEO, Mullenlowe Lintas Group; Chief Strategy Officer, APAC, Mullenlowe Group

Isha Brand Insight is designed in a very condensed way to bring you the knowledge on how to go about branding in your organization. Branding your products in a very power-packed format which brings together the best practitioners and theory for you to understand easily what branding is all about and how you can apply it to your own company.
Strategic Advisory Partner; Former COO & CSO, Cheil India, South West Asia

The environment is incredibly conducive to supporting one another, to supporting learning. The second thing is that it is very hands-on. There's a Resource Leader sitting at every table. So, even after the sessions are over, you'll find participants are very eager to take your input.
Chief Strategy & Communications Officer, National Foundation for India

It's been a through and through positive experience over the last few days at the program – from hospitality to the organizing, from the participants to every expert that's here imparting their knowledge and wisdom. How much difference the environment and your co-collaborators make to learning and how much there is to learn regardless of your experience is something I'll take away.
Co-Founder & Managing Partner, Branding, Azendor Consulting

It was extremely interesting for me because the kind of energy that I saw amongst the participants was absolutely amazing. I think it happens when you put together some of the best practitioners in the business as speakers and then you have a bunch of very eager learners. That, I think, creates the energy which makes this kind of a workshop so very useful for everyone.

Reimagine branding based on Sadhguru’s timeless wisdom and penetrating yet practical insights
yourself as you scale your business with tools for inner wellbeing offered by Sadhguru in the powerfully energized ambience of Isha Yoga Center
Founder & CEO, Bonsai Solutions LLC

I have spent my entire life in the branding space, and this event was a golden chest of information with live examples. It has been a great learning experience from stalwarts in India. To do justice to such a strong topic in such a short period of time is a stupendous feat.
MD & Co-Founder, Core Sensing
As a Westerner, I was impressed by how relevant this course was to both me and my company. I did not expect to go so deeply into purpose, but this turned out to be the most eye-opening aspect for me.
Head - India Region, Strategic, Biz Support Rockfall BU

This was the first time I was exposed to the brand-building process and was simply wowed by the insights on brand purpose, target audience, and positioning. The session host, speakers, Resource Leaders and others were mindful that these were some of the baby steps that we are taking in an otherwise exhaustive and niche process.
MD & Regional Head - India, Southeast Asia and Pacific, Maccaferri

Brand Insight helped my team and me examine our brand from the customer's perspective – from how they experience us to how our processes either enhanced or took away from the brand. It then gave us the tools to reimagine everything from our purpose to our positioning.
Director, AI Enterprises

Coming here, I always thought that business does not need a lot of branding, especially in my sector. But now, I've understood that branding is actually an important lever to scale up my business. A very important myth that I had about branding, that you really need a lot of money for it, was busted here as well.
Co-Founder, Meghavi Wellness

Anyone who is looking to create a brand that lives beyond their lifespan should get into it. Coming to these two and a half days, being among the top industry leaders and resources, has been the most crucial aspect. It has been very enriching in terms of getting the sharpness to revisit, re-look, and strengthen my own company's brand. Thank you so much.
Get insights, tools and frameworks from highly successful and experienced brand practitioners who have worked on a multitude of well-known brands across industries and geographies.

cards.title: Sonal Dabral
cards.designation: Creative consultant based in Mumbai and the former Chief Creative Officer of Ogilvy South and South East Asia.

children.value: Sonal Dabral is a creative consultant based in Mumbai and the former Chief Creative Officer of Ogilvy South and South East Asia. In his 30-year career, he has led agencies to creative glory in three different markets across Asia, including helping drive Ogilvy Mumbai to become India’s #1 Creative Agency. Sonal has recently gone independent to pursue his love for storytelling, writing, and filmmaking and is set to debut as a feature film director this year. He is also a visiting faculty member at top institutes in India, a popular speaker, and a respected jury member for major international and regional award shows. In addition, he hosts a chat show on creativity, advertising, marketing and more.

cards.title: Sourabh Mishra
cards.designation: Co-Founder and Managing Partner, Branding at Azendor Consulting

children.value: Prior to his role as the Co-Founder and Managing Partner, Branding at Azendor Consulting, Sourabh Mishra has had over two decades of work experience. He led the brand strategy planning function nationally at advertising agencies such as Saatchi & Saatchi, TBWA, Everest and Bates CHI & Partners. He has headed the brand strategy planning function at Ogilvy’s Mumbai and Bangalore offices, McCann Erickson’s Bangalore office and Contract Advertising’s Bangalore and Delhi offices. He also did brief stints as a brand strategist at BPL Telecom and Reliance Capital. His brand planning experience spans across categories such as packaged consumer goods, banking and financial services, business-to-business brands, IT, automobiles and consumer durables. He has worked on launching new brands, e.g., OLX.in, ITC Aashirvaad, Ayurvedic Concepts (Himalaya), Skoda Rapid etc. in India. He also volunteers with AIC (Atal Incubation Centre) at NMIMS, Mumbai and IEF (www.ief.in) to help and advise start-up entrepreneurs with the brand strategy.

cards.title: S.Subramanyeswar
cards.designation: Group CEO, Mullenlowe Lintas Group and Chief Strategy Officer, APAC, Mullenlowe Group

children.value: S. Subramanyeswar, better known as Subbu, has spent two-and-a-half decades in advertising and marketing, having worked at Wipro, Publicis, Rediffusion Y&R, and Saatchi & Saatchi in the markets of India, US and UK. He has anchored brands including Procter & Gamble, Unilever, Colgate, Citibank, General Mills, Samsung, Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, Tata Tea, Tanishq, Idea Cellular, Britannia, Google, Flipkart, Fastrack, Swiggy, ZEE, TVS and so on. Subbu is also a visiting faculty at top business schools IIM Ahmedabad, IIM Bangalore, IIM Nagpur in India and has delivered talks at the distinguished Kellogg School of Management, Illinois and MIT Sloan, Boston in US. He is author of 'Brands to Stands' a book that celebrates the stories behind the creation of India’s leading brands.

cards.title: Atika Malik
cards.designation: Strategic Advisory Partner to founders and CEOs of brands looking to scale.

children.value: Atika serves as Strategic Advisory Partner to founders and CEOs of brands looking to scale. She is also a partner with scores of digital platforms across industries, including NASSCOM’s FutureSkills Prime. She has a rich experience in various sectors such as, retail, digital media, e-commerce, influencer marketing, and brand communication. Atika has worked in markets ranging from China to Brazil and on many well-known brands, including Samsung, Unilever, Pepsi, Morris Garages, Lays, Sony, Nestle, Adidas and Reckitt Benckiser, driving category adoption and market entry. She has also spoken at Cannes Lions and judged numerous advertising award shows.

cards.title: Anisha Motwani
cards.designation: Brand and Innovation Expert, STORM the NORM Ventures; Independent Board Director

children.value: Anisha Motwani has been the Advisor with the World Bank on the prestigious ‘Swachh Bharat Programme’, ‘Adoption of Solar Rooftops’ and National Mission for Clean Ganga. Anisha serves as an Independent Director on the board of some leading organizations: Abbott India; L&T Investments; Welspun India Ltd.; Star Health Insurance Pvt Ltd; Prataap Snacks Ltd; Somany Home Innovations Ltd. She is a multifaceted business leader and draws from her diverse experience of more than 30 years across industries — FMCG, automobiles, financial and health services. After a successful corporate career spanning 25 years, Anisha founded StormTheNorm Ventures in 2015, a company specializing in brand, digital and innovation projects. She brings in new perspectives on how businesses can challenge the conventional norms and storm them in a way that will help them re-wire to succeed in a disruptive world. In her podcast channel https://soundcloud.com/stormthenorm, she takes on and disrupts different norms across the business landscape. In the last few years, as an entrepreneur, Anisha has given strategic advice to a range of clients, including Nestle, Viacom 18, Hindustan Unilever, Whirlpool Home Appliances, Schneider Electrical, AMEX cards, Welspun India and the Max Group. She is the author of Storm the Norm — first-of-its-kind collection of 20 contemporary stories of truly inspiring businesses and brands from India that either wrote or rewrote the norms of their respective industries and brought in unprecedented change.

cards.title: Dheeraj Sinha
cards.designation: CEO and Chief Strategy Officer — South Asia at Leo Burnett

children.value:
Dheeraj is the CEO and Chief Strategy Officer — South Asia at Leo Burnett. He is the author of two bestsellers on the Indian consumer market — India Reloaded, published by Westland in India and Palgrave, internationally. And Consumer India, which, published by John Wiley & Sons, is a recommended read at Wharton Business School’s course on emerging markets.

Currently, he is leading the transformation of Leo Burnett to a new-age company. Transforming both the client and the talent mix. Over the last 3 years, Leo Burnett has added more than 70 new clients/projects, most of them from the new-economy. Dheeraj along with his teams has led Leo Burnett to become one of the most-awarded Indian agencies at APAC Effies 2020 and AdFest 2020. He has led his teams to win Gold at Cannes Lions Effectiveness, Grand Prix at Spikes Asia, Fast Company’s Top 20 World Changing Ideas, Top 5 in Publics Groupe’s Global Cannes-Do Awards and Leo Burnett’s Global Agency Office of the Year.

Dheeraj has also won the Jay Chiat Planning Award, the Asian Marketing Effectiveness Award and the Yahoo Big Idea Chair. He is a three times winner of the Atticus Awards (WPP’s award for best published thinking). Dheeraj was on AdAge’s (India) list of Ad People of the Year, 2015. He was amongst the top 40 advertising and marketing professionals in Asia Pacific in Campaign Asia’s top 40 under 40 list for 2014.

Dheeraj has spoken at the Cannes Lions Festival of Advertising; The Spikes Asia Festival of Creativity, the Next 4 Billion Conference, Denmark; Harvard India Conference, Boston and the Asian Marketing Effectiveness Festival amongst other platforms. He has served on the jury of Spikes Asia Effectiveness Awards, APAC Effies, Tangrams and Asian Marketing Effectiveness awards, amongst many others.

Dheeraj has helped shaped the journey of several coveted brands, including Spotify, Amazon, ACKO, PharmEasy, HDFC Bank, Bajaj, MasterCard, Maybank, Sensodyne, Star Bharat, Virgin Mobile, Max Bupa, RedFM, Marico Corporate, Tata AIG, and ITC Aashirwad.

cards.title: Ameen Haque
cards.designation: Founder, Storywallahs

children.value: Ameen Haque
is the founder of
Storywallahs

and believes good stories happen to those who can tell them. He considers himself a story monk i.e. both a student as well as a practitioner and teacher of storytelling. CEO’ s, change makers and business leaders from across the world have turned to him for help with their stories. He has studied business administration and followed that up with a course in advertising & media planning from MICA. Formerly a Vice President at Ogilvy & Mather, Ameen has over 20 years of experience in advertising, marketing, consulting and theatre. His work is deeply influenced by his experiences in communications, both as a marketer and as an actor. He learned storytelling while creating campaigns for some of the biggest brands, helping start-up founders raise funds and while telling stories to those with the lowest attention spans - children. When not studying or teaching storytelling, he loves climbing hills and playing table tennis.

children.value: The very first in-person edition of “Brand Insight” was conducted in the pristine natural setting of Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore. Forty six participants, including brand managers, business owners, and C-suite executives from a wide spectrum of B2B and B2C businesses came together to learn how to take their brands to the next level.
Here are some glimpses.

video.title: A Unique Program for Brand Strategists
The Importance of Creating Purposeful Brands
How do you address the questions that plague the business mind regarding branding?
How Does Your Brand Impact Your Business

faqs.question: What is the “Brand Insight” program?

children.value: The “Brand Insight” program is an immersive journey into the world of branding, offered by Isha Leadership Academy. It aims to deepen your understanding of branding strategies, empower you to create impactful brands, and explore the essence of successful brand management.

faqs.question: Who should attend the “Brand Insight” program?

children.value: The program is designed for professionals, entrepreneurs, marketing leaders, and individuals passionate about branding. Whether you are new to the field or seeking to enhance your brand management skills, this program offers valuable insights for all.

faqs.question: Who leads the “Brand Insight” program sessions?

children.value: Expert facilitators with extensive experience in branding, marketing, and business leadership guide the “Brand Insight” program. They share practical knowledge, real-world case studies, and effective branding techniques to enrich your learning experience.

faqs.question: What are the key highlights of “Brand Insight”?

children.value: The “Brand Insight” program offers:
Strategic Branding Insights
: Gain deep insights into strategic brand building, differentiation, and communication strategies that drive business success.
Case Studies
: Explore real-world brand success stories and challenges, dissecting the strategies that propelled them to the forefront.
Interactive Workshops
: Engage in hands-on exercises and workshops to apply branding concepts and develop innovative brand strategies.
Networking Opportunities
: Connect with a diverse group of participants and expand your professional network within the branding community.

faqs.question: Is prior branding experience required to attend the program?

children.value: No prior branding experience is required to attend the “Brand Insight” program. The program is tailored to accommodate participants from diverse backgrounds, offering foundational to advanced branding concepts.

faqs.question: Where are the “Brand Insight” program sessions conducted?

children.value: The Brand Insight Program sessions take place in a conducive, tranquil and inspiring learning environment at the Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore.

faqs.question: How can I enroll in the “Brand Insight” program?

children.value: To apply, please fill out this registration form.

faqs.question: How long is the “Brand Insight” program?

children.value: The program is typically conducted over a span of two and a half days. It is designed to provide an immersive and transformative experience for participants.

faqs.question: What is the last date to avail the Early Bird offer?

children.value: The Early Bird offer is available for limited seats only and is therefore subject to availability.

faqs.question: Can two discount offers be clubbed together?

children.value: No, two discount offers cannot be clubbed.

faqs.question: Is financial assistance available for the “Brand Insight” program?

children.value: Currently, we do not offer financial assistance for the “Brand Insight” program.

faqs.question: Who is a Speaker? Can I ask questions to the Speaker?

children.value: A Speaker is an experienced individual with expertise in a specific field, sharing insights on topics such as organizational culture, talent nurturing and more. They provide valuable learning to participants. For example, in Brand Insight 2023, S. Subramanyeswar (Group CEO, Mullenlowe Lintas Group) spoke about how having a clear purpose is the key to creating a strong brand for any organization. Participants have the opportunity to ask questions to the Speaker during a Q&A session following their presentation.

faqs.question: Can I attend the “Brand Insight” program multiple times?

children.value: Absolutely! The program offers a dynamic and evolving curriculum. Participants are welcome to attend the program multiple times to deepen their understanding, gain new perspectives, and stay updated on the latest branding trends.

faqs.question: In what language are the program sessions conducted?

children.value: The program is conducted in English.

faqs.question: Is the “Brand Insight” program certified or accredited?

children.value: The “Brand Insight” program is a unique offering by Isha Education and does not hold official certification or accreditation from external educational institutions. However, participants will receive a certificate of completion at the end of the program to acknowledge their participation and learning.

Dheeraj along with his teams has led Leo Burnett to become one of the most-awarded Indian agencies at APAC Effies 2020 and AdFest 2020. He has led his teams to win Gold at Cannes Lions Effectiveness, Grand Prix at Spikes Asia, Fast Company’s Top 20 World Changing Ideas, Top 5 in Publics Groupe’s Global Cannes-Do Awards and Leo Burnett’s Global Agency Office of the Year.

Dheeraj has also won the Jay Chiat Planning Award, the Asian Marketing Effectiveness Award and the Yahoo Big Idea Chair. He is a three times winner of the Atticus Awards (WPP’s award for best published thinking). Dheeraj was on AdAge’s (India) list of Ad People of the Year, 2015. He was amongst the top 40 advertising and marketing professionals in Asia Pacific in Campaign Asia’s top 40 under 40 list for 2014.

Dheeraj has spoken at the Cannes Lions Festival of Advertising; The Spikes Asia Festival of Creativity, the Next 4 Billion Conference, Denmark; Harvard India Conference, Boston and the Asian Marketing Effectiveness Festival amongst other platforms. He has served on the jury of Spikes Asia Effectiveness Awards, APAC Effies, Tangrams and Asian Marketing Effectiveness awards, amongst many others.

Dheeraj has helped shaped the journey of several coveted brands, including Spotify, Amazon, ACKO, PharmEasy, HDFC Bank, Bajaj, MasterCard, Maybank, Sensodyne, Star Bharat, Virgin Mobile, Max Bupa, RedFM, Marico Corporate, Tata AIG, and ITC Aashirwad.

cards.title: Ameen Haque
cards.designation: Founder, Storywallahs

children.value: Ameen Haque
is the founder of
Storywallahs

and believes good stories happen to those who can tell them. He considers himself a story monk i.e. both a student as well as a practitioner and teacher of storytelling. CEO’ s, change makers and business leaders from across the world have turned to him for help with their stories. He has studied business administration and followed that up with a course in advertising & media planning from MICA. Formerly a Vice President at Ogilvy & Mather, Ameen has over 20 years of experience in advertising, marketing, consulting and theatre. His work is deeply influenced by his experiences in communications, both as a marketer and as an actor. He learned storytelling while creating campaigns for some of the biggest brands, helping start-up founders raise funds and while telling stories to those with the lowest attention spans - children. When not studying or teaching storytelling, he loves climbing hills and playing table tennis.

json.thankyouDescription2: If you do not find the email in your Primary Inbox, please check your Promotions or Spam folder and move the email to the Primary Inbox.

allIlaLandingPages.title: Insight Program Facilitators and Resource Leaders

_seoMetaTags.content: Insight Program Facilitators and Resource Leaders

attributes.content: Insight Program Facilitators and Resource Leaders

attributes.name: twitter:title
attributes.content: Insight Program Facilitators and Resource Leaders

children.value: A rare opportunity to imbibe the essence of successfully scaling up businesses from industry stalwarts.

cards.title: Amit Anchal
cards.designation: Board Member, Ola Electric

children.value:
Amit is a Board member of Ola Electric and has led Strategy, Corporate Finance and Corporate Development for Ola & Ola Electric for the last couple of years.

He partners with the Founder (Bhavish Aggarwal) in bringing strategic direction to the businesses as well as leads the corporate finance for the group including Equity, Debt fundraising, Capital Market (IPO), Corporate structuring, M&A etc.

Prior to his current role, Amit led similar role for Airtel and Bharti Group Companies.

Amit has always worked with first generation enterprises. Before his current role with Bhavish, he was with Airtel working directly with Sunil Mittal in various roles for 18 years.

Amit has worked with first generation entrepreneurs in building strategy and executing fast growth. In the last 24 months he has worked closely with Bhavish as Ola electric scaled up to be the iconic EV play in India.

Similarly, he has been part of Bharti and Airtel’s phenomenal growth and expansion for close to 18 years.

He has also been a part of several strategic and growth initiatives such as Indus and Infratel Towerco creation, Africa passive infra sale and lease back, IT & Network outsourcing (all Harvard Case studies now).

Amit has been a foremost deal-maker and fund raiser (Private and Capital markets) throughout his career. In Airtel itself he has successfully executed over 70 large transactions of M&A, Fundraising, JV etc. Many of these deals are multi-billion dollar ones.

Amit enjoys very strong relationships with funds across VC, PE and Capital market spectrum and has led fundraising that are largest in the PE space in India.

He has worked on businesses across sectors including Consumer Internet, EV, Fintech, Telecom, Towers, Renewable energy etc.

cards.title: Anala Padmanabha
cards.designation: Consultant, Director, Mckinsey/UAE

children.value:
Anala Padmanabha, is a leader in the People & Organizational Performance Practice. She delivers growth, innovation, and organizational agility and is an expert on culture change, leadership development, team effectiveness, capability building, and transformation. She also works extensively with clients to drive organizational effectiveness at pivotal moments—such as merger, strategic shift, and crisis—and lead large-scale performance improvement programs integrating strategic, operational, and cultural initiatives.

Anala’s consulting journey began with EY as senior consultant majoring in Mergers and Acquisitions. Being a Chartered Accountant gave her further insights into international business and relations. This exposure took her to work with IDA and other international organizations associated in fostering a healthy culture, Diversity, Inclusion and a holistic growth oriented economy. McKinsey offered Anala a platform to build sustainable human development and performance models along with powering the learning and development engine of many organizations, Governments, Non-Profit Organizations to name a few.

Anala is also the founder director of a real estate Development firm in Benagaluru, which aims at building ESG and sustainable buildings. Featured by the Architectural digest, this award winning firm has projects all over India and aboard, aiming at building sustainable and Environmental friendly projects.

Anala is an active volunteer at Isha Foundation, a trained classical singer, a yoga practitioner and meditator, an avid reader, a certified scuba diver, a teacher and loves spending time with students. She thinks that the future leadership should be that of inclusion and responsible.

cards.title: Arvind K Singhal
cards.designation: Founder & Chairman of Technopak Advisors

children.value:
Arvind (61 years) is the Founder & Chairman of Technopak Advisors. Having started its operations on January 1992, Technopak is one of India’s leading management consulting firms focusing on 4 key sectors that include consumer products and retail, textiles and apparel, packaged food & food services, and education & skills development.

He has a Bachelor of Engineering degree from IIT-Roorkee, India (1979) that has also recognized him as a “Distinguished Alumnus”, India and an MBA from UCLA, USA (1982). Over the years, Arvind has been invited to speak at leading academic institutions and professional forums which include Harvard (USA), Wharton (USA), UCLA (USA), ESADE (Spain), various IIMs (India) and IITs (India), and the Vatican (Italy) to list a few. He also writes frequently for leading Indian and International publications with over 400 published pieces to date.

Arvind sits on several Boards (including some not-for-profit). He is currently on the statutory Boards of Welspun India, Greaves Cotton Ltd., Blue Star Ltd., Metro Shoes, and Premium Transmission Ltd.

cards.title: Deepta Rangarajan
cards.designation: President and Co-Founder, IRIS Business Services Limited

children.value: Deepta is Co-Founder of IRIS Business Services (BSE: IRIS), a global regtech firm with clients in over 40 countries around the world, and a leader in the space of open data standards for financial reporting. Deepta has led and managed some of IRIS’ flagship products and key business lines over the past 30 years. She was part of a core team that drove IRIS’ business pivot from services to products 7 years ago, and is currently sponsoring the fastest growing business line in IRIS. Prior to IRIS, Deepta worked at American Express Bank and CRISIL. A graduate of Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi and Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad, Deepta has been profiled in the bestseller, ‘Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish’, which chronicles the journey of 25 entrepreneurs from IIM Ahmedabad. She was also featured as one of Navi Mumbai’s Power Women. Deepta enjoys reading, singing (and humming) and working with her teams at IRIS to help them in whatever way she can, as they blaze through new challenges in their professional journey each day.

cards.title: Gajendra Chandel
cards.designation: Founder, Viribus Unitis Consulting; Former CHRO, TATA Motors

children.value: Gajendra Chandel is Former President and CHRO, Tata Motors. He joined Tata Motors in 2014, from another Tata Group Company, Tata AutoComp Systems where he was the Group CHRO from 2005 to 2014. At Tata Motors, he led the Reorganisation, Restructuring, and Re-energising Project as part of the Transformation agenda with the responsibility of various strategic growth initiatives of the company. He also pioneered Next-Gen HR and Business practices, seen as trendsetters and industry benchmarks. In pursuit of transformation, he piloted significant initiatives, e.g., building a robust Leadership pipeline, rejuvenated business performance process re-skilling/up-skilling, employee experience and resource productivity, market footprint, customer experience, making the organization agile and lean fighting machine, to be amongst the top global players. Previously, he worked with Siemens in India, Germany, and the USA for almost 13 years where he held various operational and strategic assignments at local, country, and international levels, including the Global Leadership Framework Project. He was honored with the Leader of the Year Award in 1997 by LMI Inc. The USA. Gajendra loves photography, hiking, and reading. It is Gajendra’s dream to create, support, coach, and guide at least a dozen successful entrepreneurs.

cards.title: Girish Rao
cards.designation: Former CEO, ESSAR Steel Middle East

children.value:
Former CEO, ESSAR Steel Middle East

Girish Rao has more than 35 years of experience in the fields of consumer durables, steel, and retail. An MMS graduate from BHU, he worked with BPL where he had a successful stint, ending as Head of Sales. Then he joined LG Electronics as Vice President of Sales and Marketing, where he drove market expansion taking the brand to the leading position in all categories in India.

Later as CEO of ESSAR Steel Hypermart, he set up a first-of-its-kind retail business for steel, catering to the MSME sector. This model became a pioneering benchmark in the steel industry and set new standards.

As CEO for ESSAR Steel Middle East in Dubai, he increased the company’s presence in the GCC and Iraq. Currently, he is a consultant and has set up INSALESPRO, a community for the sales fraternity in the country. Girish is an avid traveler, reader and golfer.

cards.title: Madhukar Kamath
cards.designation: Chairman Emeritus, DDB Mudra Group

children.value: Madhukar has over four decades of experience in the area of Marketing Services, Media & Advertising. He was the Group CEO and MD of the DDB Mudra Group, India’s leading integrated marketing communications group. He also served as the Chairman of Interbrand (the world’s leading brand consultancy) in India. Madhukar has led several industry bodies. He has been the President of AAAI and Chairman of ASCI. He is currently the Chairman of ABC. He serves of the Board of Music Broadcast India (RadioCity). He is the recipient of the Lifetime Achievement Award. His commitment to the cause of Children and the Girl Child with Plan India has led to his appointment to the Global Board of Plan International recently. Madhukar was also the Chairman of the Mudra Foundation and the Governing Council of MICA, India’s foremost business school for Strategic Marketing and Communications Management.

cards.title: Murali Sivaraman
cards.designation: Chairman/Board Director; Former President, Philips Lighting (Growth Markets)

children.value: Murali Sivaraman is an accomplished business leader, who has worked in India, Singapore, China, Canada and London. He is presently a Non-Executive Chairman and Independent Director of Huhtamaki PPL Ltd, Independent Director in Bharat Forge Limited and ICICI Lombard General Insurance Co. Limited. In his previous role, he served as President of Philips Lighting, Growth Markets, based in Singapore. During his tenure at Philips, he has successfully completed and integrated large acquisitions in India, China and the Middle East. He also worked with Akzo Nobel (formerly ICI) for nearly 20 years in global positions. He has more than three decades of experience in building brands/channel for fast-moving electrical/decorative goods across the world. He is a Chartered Accountant, Cost and Works Accountant and holds a Post Graduate Diploma in Management from the Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad. He has also completed Advanced Management Program from Harvard Business School.

cards.title: Nandakumar K Nair
cards.designation: Founder and CEO, SunTec Business Solutions

children.value:
Nandakumar K Nair (NK), is the Founder and CEO of SunTec Business Solutions, leaders in revenue management and business assurance solutions. With nearly three-and-a-half decades of experience in the banking, telecom, retail and travel industry, he has shaped customer-centric software platforms and products for pricing and billing across these transaction-intensive verticals. He is credited with building the first automated billing solution for India’s national telecom provider.

He has pioneered and patented the concept of real-time value-chain management in digital business ecosystems and has contributed in evolving the relationship-based pricing philosophy for banking – now acknowledged as the key to balanced pricing dynamics.

A widely read writer, he has written for several technology newsletters and blogs and spoken at various technology and industry thought leadership summits. He is associated with industry forums such as CII, NASSCOM and TiE and is also a keen mentor of start-ups and entrepreneurs.

cards.title: Prabhakar Tadepalli
cards.designation: Co-Founder, President and COO, Tyfone Inc.

children.value:
As Co-Founder, President and COO of Tyfone Inc, Prabhakar is responsible for all product and business development aspects of Tyfone in the Asia-Pacific region. A seasoned technology executive, he is instrumental in shaping and directing company strategy. Tyfone specializes in identity security, privacy protection and cyber safety products for Government, Financial Services and Healthcare among other domains.

Tyfone operates in the US, Asia-Pacific, Middle-East and Africa markets. The Company’s growth and reputation are a testament to Prabhakar’s vast domain knowledge and his keen perception of industry-specific identity security and data protection needs.
Prior to establishing Tyfone, Prabhakar was Founder CEO of Finatus, a venture-backed cloud-services company which was one of the earliest companies in the space to target the industrial SME markets in the US.

cards.title: Rachna Aggarwal
cards.designation: Founder Partner, 92 Angels; Former CEO, Indus League (a brand division of Future Lifestyle Fashion)

children.value:
Rachna is a founder partner at 92Angels, a nurture seed capital fund and a mentor/advisor to many young entrepreneurs.

At 92Angels, she looks for deep science/ deep tech paradigm-changing ideas of first-time graduate entrepreneurs to mentor and invest in.

She has 25 years of rich experience in brand building in the fashion industry being the promoter founder of Indus-League and then CEO of the lifestyle brand business of the Future Group.

She did her schooling at Loreto House and her B Sc (Economics) from St. Xavier’s College, Kolkata followed by her PGDM from IIM, Ahmedabad.

Rachna is married to Arun Sirdeshmukh and they have two daughters Riya (21) and Risha (16). She loves to travel, play mahjongg, binge on television serials or get creative by making candles and doing pottery or decoupage.

cards.title: Rajeev Mecheri
cards.designation: Managing Director, Mecheri Smart Capital Pvt Ltd

children.value:
Has over 25 years of experience in “Smart building” technologies and solutions. Co-founded & built “iMetrex Group” which included India’s leading Security, Safety & Building Automation company - DATS, a product distribution business – Vista, and an Irish technology business Europlex. Siemens acquired 100% of the group in December 2009.

Currently involved in growing the interests of Mecheri Holdings in the Real Estate Tech & Aviation Tech, Joint Ventures with global corporations for South Asia market and investing in early stage technology start up's. With an active involvement in the not for profit sector for over 25 years through Mecheri Foundation, his current passion is to build a giving platform by delivering business value for e-commerce brands.

He is the Honorary Consul for Ireland, Member of the board of Management of Krea University, Trustee and Founder Director of Chennai International Centre, Founder President of EO Chennai & Former Regional Chair of YPO South Asia

cards.title: Rakesh Malhotra
cards.designation: Founder of SAR Group, Luminous, Livpure, Livguard and Ncubate Capital

children.value: Rakesh Malhotra is the Founder of the SAR Group and Luminous Power Technologies. He is a serial entrepreneur since 1988 and an early stage investor in India, Singapore and the US. SAR Group companies are engaged in a wide range of industries including power electronics, energy storage, renewable energy, water and air purification, industrial IOT etc. Rakesh also serves as the Managing Partner of Ncubate Capital Partners, which invests in early stage companies in India from an open-ended balance sheet fund. A graduate from Jadavpur University India in Electronics & Telecom Engineering, he started his career in 1983 at NELCO (Tata Group) followed by Mitsui and Siemens. Since 1988, he has been a Founder/Co-Founder of 14 ventures and has exited 8 of these. These companies currently employ more than 9,000 people and have combined revenues of close to USD 1 billion. He actively mentors many startups in India and Singapore and keenly interacts with engineering and B school students to develop their interest in entrepreneurship. He serves on various industrial/technology committees in India and presents papers at engineering conferences. He is a family person and has an avid interest in traveling, playing cricket, music and business reading.

cards.title: Ravi Kirpalani
cards.designation: Independent Director and Chairman, Foseco India Ltd; Former Managing Director and CEO, ThyssenKrupp

children.value:
Ravi is currently the Managing Director and CEO of ThyssenKrupp India. Prior to this, he was the Managing Director of Castrol India.
Ravi brings over 34 years of experience in sales, marketing, strategy development and as a CEO of a large and successful listed company.
He has worked with global and culturally diverse teams and led major transformational programs. Ravi has a deep passion for customer relationships, building brands and developing people. He enjoys engaging and energizing people and helping build a culture based on values.
Ravi has lived in the UK, Middle East and India and worked with the leadership teams in many countries. A strong advocate of diversity and inclusion, he brings a global mindset and is completely at ease in working with different cultures and in matrixed organizations.
Ravi studied Economics at St Stephen’s College Delhi and has an MBA from IIM Kolkata.

cards.title: Satyakam Arya
cards.designation: Managing Director & CEO, Daimler India Commercial Vehicles

children.value: Satyakam Arya is the Managing Director & CEO of Daimler Truck operations in India since end of 2018. Under his stewardship, DICV continues to grow as a strong, progressive and transformational player in the domestic market with the made-for-India commercial vehicle brand ‘BharatBenz’. In his career with Daimler, Satyakam has aggressively expanded export operations of other Daimler Truck brands including Mercedes-Benz, FUSO and Freightliner in over 60 markets worldwide.
Prior to this, Satyakam worked in Tokyo, Japan as Head of Customer Services & Procurement for Daimler Truck Asia.

With over 25 years of experience across the automotive value chain in various OEMs, Satyakam believes in leading with a long-term vision to achieve profitability and scale with complete integrity and empower his team to create solutions to achieve sustainable results. His core competencies include Strategic Sourcing, Project Management, Partner Management, Leadership development and Business transformation.
He holds a Bachelors of Engineering in Mechanical Studies and has completed the Senior Management Program for Executives (Strategy and Operations) at IIM Kolkata in 2010.

Satyakam is deeply engaged with industry associations, being chairman of CII Tamil Nadu for FY 2022-'23. He is currently a member of the Executive Council of SIAM (Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers).
He was honoured as the "CV Man of the Year 2020" at the Apollo CV awards and recognized as "CEO of the Year 2022" by The Machinist, part of Worldwide Media, Bennett Coleman – The Times Group.

cards.title: Shalini Kamath
cards.designation: Founder and CEO, SK & Associates

children.value:
Shalini Kamath is a Certified and practicing CEO & Leadership Coach, focusing on Change and Transformation journeys of individuals and organizations. She also works in the area of Leadership Development and Diversity & Inclusion initiatives across organizations.

Shalini is an Independent Director on the Boards of Borosil Glassworks Ltd. and Graphite India. She is on the Advisory Board of TRAAIN and the Past Chairperson for FICCI – Women on Corporate Boards Mentorship program.

Passionate about Human Resources having led the function at ChevronTexaco, Star, KPMG and Ambit, she also has a deep understanding of Marketing and Corporate Communications having worked in these fields with Raytheon and Ambit.

Shalini began her working career in Zambia and Botswana in Southern Africa with over a decade+ experience in tripartite partnership projects.

An MBA graduate from Edinburgh Business School, UK, trained at Harvard Business School in Change and Transformation, a certified Zenger Folkman facilitator, a sought after speaker, she is a firm believer in continuous renewal to remain relevant in today’s fast changing world.

cards.title: Shashi Shekhar
cards.designation: Managing Director, Camfil India

children.value: Shashi Shekhar is a business leader and a strategic thinker with more than 28 years of experience in the field of Industrial, Government, and Consumer Business. He has held several leadership positions in companies like Sandvik, 3M & DuPont. Currently serving as the Managing Director of Camfil India (A Swedish MNC and Global Leader in Air Filtration), is responsible for leading the Clean Air Business for India, Sri Lanka, and Bangladesh. He is passionate about making ‘Clean air a human right’. A Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering from BIT Sindri and IIM Bangalore alumni has accomplished several professional enhancement programs including Six Sigma DMAIC, DFSS, Leadership Development. Over these years, Mr. Shekhar has been awarded numerous prestigious industry awards and recognized in several industry-leading publications including Forbes, Industry Outlook, CEO Insights, and many more. With the firm belief in youth being the country’s future, Shekhar has mentored several students and held various advisory positions with numerous startups. Presently, Shashi is an advisor on AI for Ikigai Labs, an initiative of IIT Kanpur.

cards.title: Sunil Buch
cards.designation: Co-Founder and CEO, Wellness Niyamas

children.value:
Sunil Buch is a versatile and multi-talented leader. He has over two decades of leadership and general management experience spanning FMCG, Advertising, Telecom, Retail and the Media & Entertainment sectors. He has served and contributed in leadership roles at Colgate — Palmolive, Johnson & Johnson, Leo Burnett, Marico, Reliance Communications and ZEE Entertainment Enterprises Limited where he was the CEO of Zee Live and Zee Talent. In 2017, he crafted one of the most interesting partnerships between Zee & Rally for Rivers, which gave one of the best advertising films for the rally.

Currently, he is the Co-Founder and CEO of Wellness Niyamas, a innovative healthcare start up, and is also Non-Executive Independent Director on Board of Orbit Exports, a listed company. He specializes in creating profitable brand-led businesses via thought leadership, entrepreneurial problem-solving, creative strategy and execution. Happy People make Happy Products & Services and the PAT principle are the two tenets he strongly propagates and believes in. Sunil is a science graduate and MBA from Mumbai University.

cards.title: M.S. Unnikrishnan
cards.designation: CEO, IITB-Monash Research Academy

children.value: Mr. M. S. Unnikrishnan (Unny) is the CEO of IITB-Monash Research Academy, a research institute dedicated to a PhD program in cutting edge technologies and management, jointly promoted by IIT Bombay and the Monash University of Australia. He has previously held the position of M.D. & CEO of Thermax Group for over 13 years and played a pivotal role in the growth, professionalisation and globalisation of the company.

He serves on KEC International and Azure Power Limited boards. He is also a trustee of “Akshaya Patra,” the largest NGO of India that feeds 19 lakhs/ day underprivileged school children, and Jehangir Hospital, Pune.
Mr. Unnikrishnan chairs the Central Mechanical Engineering Research Institute (CMERI), Durgapur, and is a member of the Governing Councils of TERI and Army Institute of Technology.
He is also associated with the Government of India as:

– Co-Chairperson of “Srijan” program for SIDBI-TIFAC for start-up funding
– Member, Apex Council, Prime Minister’s Doctoral Research Fellowship
– Director of the Technology Innovation Hub, IIT Palakkad
– Expert committee member, SAIF Centres, Ministry of Science & Tech, GOI
– Expert committee member, SATHI program, Ministry of Science & Tech, GOI

A graduate in Mechanical Engineering from VNIT, Nagpur, he has also completed his Advanced Management Program from the Harvard Business School, Boston, USA. He continues to be a keen student of energy, environment, and management.

cards.title: Vijay Nakra
cards.designation: President, Automotive Division & Member of Group Executive Board, Mahindra & Mahindra Limited

children.value: Veejay Ram Nakra is the President for the Automotive Division of Mahindra & Mahindra and also a member of Mahindra’s Group Executive Board. His portfolio consists of multiple domestic and global business segments which includes Passenger Vehicles, Commercial Vehicles (HCVs, LCVs, SCVs, & Vans, etc.), and Construction Equipment. Veejay is Chairman of the board of directors for Mahindra and Mahindra South Africa, Mahindra Ideal Lanka, and Mahindra eMarket. He is also a Director on the boards of Mahindra Electric Mobility and NBS international.

Veejay has held various strategic positions over the past 25 years at M&M. Early in his career, he was a part of the core team that developed and launched the Scorpio. After establishing the Scorpio, as its first brand manager, he was responsible for Mahindra’s international business in Sub Sahara Africa region as CEO, Mahindra South Africa. On his return to India, Veejay held the National Sales Head- Automotive Division position, which was followed by a stint as Head-Sales & After-Sales. His last role, before becoming the Chief Executive, was that of Chief-Sales & Marketing Officer of the Auto Division.

Veejay is a member of the SIAM Executive Committee. He has been associated with Antarang (an NGO) and is passionate about personally mentoring young minds for career planning and skill-building for higher employability.

Veejay is a graduate in mechanical engineering from MIT, Manipal & a full-time PGDBA in Marketing from NMIMS, Mumbai. He has attended several international leadership development programs, such as Mahindra Universe at Harvard in 2013 and 2019. Veejay was, also, part of the Future Leaders Program in 2016-17, a joint initiative among M&M, Yale University, and IMD Switzerland.

cards.title: Pranay Dhabhai
cards.designation: Founder and Former Whole Time Director, Haier Appliances India Pvt Ltd

children.value: Founder and Former Whole Time Director, Haier Appliances India Pvt. Ltd.

cards.title: Jacob Mathew
cards.designation: CEO, Industree Crafts

children.value: Jacob is the CEO of Industree Foundation, and is Co-Founder of Tessaract Design, Idiom Design, Dovetail Furniture and Spring Health Water (india) Pvt Ltd. Jacob works at the intersection of Design, Business, Capital and Impact enterprises and is a design Principal at the Impact Edge Lab at Srishti Institute of Art Design and Technology. Jacob spent the first part of his life transforming business through design and intends to spend the next transforming society through business.

cards.title: Anupama Joshi
cards.designation: Former Partner, Deloitte & Touche

cards.title: Gagan Adlakha
cards.designation: Leadership Coach and Senior Partner, Vyaktitva

children.value:
Helping create conscious leaders, leadership teams, and organizations.Gagan is a Leadership Coach and a specialist in the area of Leadership Development and people performance with about 30 years of experience. An XLRI 1990 alumnus, Gagan joined the IT sector in its high growth phase and handled a variety of roles covering the complete gamut of the HR function for about 10 years. He rounded off his corporate experience by handling business roles for the next few years.

Gagan turned entrepreneur in 2004 and joined Vyaktitva as a partner with the desire to help enhance people’s performance across organizations. Gagan has been working on various Coaching, Organizational Design, and Learning & Development assignments focussed on enhancing individual and organizational performance. He has designed and delivered solutions for premier organizations including the Max group, PepsiCo, Amex, Unilever, Colgate, Airtel, Genpact, Tata AIA, Hewitt, Whirlpool, Accenture, Interglobe group, GE, ITC, Hero, RB, Mother Dairy, Ericsson, Cap Gemini, Jubilant, Viacom18, Aditya Birla Group, Godrej, CK Birla Group, Star India, CapitaLand, and IBM. His experience has been across countries, cultures, levels, and industries.

He has also done extensive work with owner/ proprietor/ family-run businesses, partnerships, and volunteers regularly for social sector organizations. In addition, Gagan is currently focusing on areas such as wellness, yoga, holistic living, meditation, mindfulness, and helping develop conscious leaders and organizations.

cards.title: Mythily Ramesh
cards.designation: Co-Founder and CEO, NextWealth

children.value: Mythily has more than 30 years of experience in her career. She completed her BE Computer Science from College of Engineering, Guindy and MBA from IIM Ahmedabad. In her 20 year successful stint in Wipro she grew from a Customer support executive to a Senior Vice President. Her career spans product management, marketing, Business Head and Quality. As a certified Black Belt she drove the Six Sigma initiative in Wipro and was successful in moving the organization from 1.7 Sigma to 4.7 Sigma and reducing the order to collection cycle from 365 days + to 120 days. With a passion for entrepreneurship, she was the CEO of a start up in Wipro called 01markets and built a successful business around e-procurement and was a pioneer in Reverse Auctions in India. She is a certified CPM and CPIM specialist. She then moved to the Corporate office to handle Mergers & Acquisitions, Business Development and Innovation. As part of Innovation she seeded multiple new service areas which have grown into 100+ million dollar business for Wipro. In her last stint in Wipro as Senior VP for Wipro BPO, she was responsible for pre-sales and solutioning, product management, transition, platform BPO, BPO Consulting and procurement BPO operations. Her target was to build the business revenue – increase the back-office business from 5% to 35 % which she did in three years timeframe and also brought in 300 million dollars of business for the division. In 2006 and 2007 she was adjudged one of the 25 most Powerful women in India by India Today and Dataquest. In February,2023 she was given the ET-Ascent Business leader of the Year award. She has also been the recipient of the Distinguished Alumni award by College of Engineering Guindy during their 225 years anniversary celebration. In 2010 she and a few ex-Wipro colleagues started a social entrepreneurship firm NextWealth focusing on AI/ML data services, back office and IT services from small towns in a unique distributed delivery model. Their mission is to create 10000 jobs in the small towns. She is currently the Co-Founder and CEO of NextWealth. She serves on the board of Karnataka Bank and is the Chairperson of their IT and Digital committee, and is a member of the Nomination and compensation committee. She is also a Director on the subsidiary of Karnataka bank KBL Services Ltd. She is a member of the Board of Governors of Indian Institute of Management, Udaipur. She is a member of the Nasscom BPM Council and heads a Task Force focusing on moving the IT/BPO industry to set up delivery centres in small towns. She retired as an Independent Director from WEP solutions Ltd and WEP Digital after serving on the board for eight years. She served as a member and as an office bearer of the Steering committee of IIMPACT for eight years, an NGO started by IIMA Alumni focusing on educating the underprivileged girl child in India. She is married with two boys and pursues painting, music and yoga in her free time.

cards.title: Hema Annamalai
cards.designation: Co-Founder and Vice Chair, Green Collar Agritech Solutions Pvt Ltd.

children.value:
Hema is the Co-Founder and Vice Chairman of Green Collar Agritech Solutions Pvt Ltd, a company that enhances the livelihood of Small and Marginal Farmers (SMF). Green Collar makes customised quality grading systems for all the stakeholders of the agri value chain, by harnessing powerful technologies of AI/ML in crop production and post harvest processing solutions.

Hema was the founder and former CEO of Ampere Vehicles, an early mover that spearheaded India’s E-Vehicles revolution. Ampere has carved a niche for itself as an innovative technology creator in the Indian Electric Vehicle Industry, contributing to environmental sustainability. Ampere has been acquired and Hema has fully exited the venture.

A serial entrepreneur, Hema has spent the last 25 years creating and driving varied entrepreneurial ventures spanning Professional Services, Electronics, Skill Development and Automobiles.

Hema strongly promotes Job Creation and focusses on Women empowerment. She also invests and mentors Innovative disruptive startups from smaller cities that solves societal problems.

Hema is the past chair of TiE ( The Indus Entrepreneurs) Women program, a global initiative of TiE that embrace, engage and empower Women. She was the Former President of TiE Coimbatore. Hema is also the Founder of Uni Connect Pte Ltd, Singapore.

Hema is the Founding Patron of Society for Smart E-Mobility (SSEM), Coimbatore.

Hema holds an MBA from Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology, Australia and a Bachelors degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Government College of Technology, Coimbatore.

cards.title: Sridhar Dharmrajan
cards.designation: EVP and MD, Hexagon Manufacturing Intelligence

children.value: CEO, MD and Strategy Leader with 30+ years of experience in successfully creating, growing, transforming and dramatically improving P&Ls/businesses. Successfully started, built and established multiple MNCs and start-ups in India over 3 decades in the ‘technology’ domain. Selected and retained the best-fit talent, coached and developed leaders. Collaboratively finds purpose in line with organizational goals. A people leader who continues to demonstrate his widely acknowledged skill and prowess in inspiring teams to work at the highest level of passion with a relentless result-oriented mindset. Excels at integrating insights towards a purposeful future of the business, and provides a platform for people to accomplish their goals. Operates with a ‘customer-centric’ approach with the ability to build compelling relationships with CxOs. Focuses on the strengths of the team in a way that has helped in maximizing and creating sustainable growth. Highly proficient in driving digital innovation and bridging the gap between existing industrial environments and emerging new technologies. Known for taking on challenging assignments and utilizing deep experience in the automotive, aerospace, defence and machinery sectors to drive innovative customer solutions and outperform the competition. 𝗚𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 r𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱 e𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗲 in innovative global product strategies, IoT, machine learning, AI, asset performance management, big data, edge computing, mobility and cloud-based technologies. Adept in complex operations/financials, smart manufacturing and organizational/business turnarounds. 𝗔𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗲𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗲: P&L Growth • Digital Innovation • Digital Thought Leadership • Strategic Planning • Product Line Leadership • Industrial Internet • Internet of Things (IoT) • New Product Rollouts • Technology Turn-Around Expertise • Cost-Cutting Initiatives • Software Thought Leadership • Cloud and SaaS Business • Certified Solution Selling • Award Winning Business Leadership

cards.title: Nagesh Basavanhalli
cards.designation: Group CEO, Greaves Cotton Limited

children.value: Nagesh A. Basavanhalli was appointed as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the company in September 2016. Since then, he has led the transformation of the company with profitable growth, unlocking higher value for the shareholders. As a Global Leader, Cleantech Enthusiast and Corporate Strategist, he is responsible for the company’s growth strategy in India and abroad. Under his leadership, Greaves Cotton Limited has signed strategic partnerships and alliances reinforcing the company’s positioning as India’s leading last-mile transportation, solutions and services company. Nagesh has core expertise in developing the strategic vision and technology roadmap, thereby leveraging brand potential, improving the top-line and bottom-line of the business. With over 20 years of experience, Nagesh is a Global Automotive Executive with the experience of leading companies to transform, grow in terms of overall market value and strengthen worldwide presence. Nagesh has been instrumental in bringing the best technology and people to create winning brands. He believes that companies can work closely with communities to drive higher economic value and develop sustainable solutions for the world. Prior to his appointment at Greaves Cotton Limited, he has been associated with Fiat Chrysler Automobiles for over two decades, last serving as the Managing Director and President of Fiat Group Automobiles India. He joined Chrysler in 1994 and has held numerous positions of increasing responsibility in engineering and product planning. He has also been associated with the ATG Group as the Group President for emerging markets. He was awarded the “Booth India Business Leader — 2009” by Chicago Booth Business School. Nagesh holds a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering from Bangalore University and a Master of Science from the University of Texas. He holds an MBA from the University of Chicago Business School.

Cancellations received between 28 to 22 days (including the 28th and 22nd day) prior to the program, will be issued a refund of 50% of the program fees.
No refunds will be made for cancellation requests received 21 days prior to the program (including the 21st day).
There will not be any refund for the amount paid towards the reservation of the seat for the program.

children.value: Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore
Coming Soon: JUNE 2024
A three-day interactive program envisioned by Sadhguru to unpack human potential in business.
Enable a paradigm shift towards seeing human beings as Possibilities instead of mere resources.

slides.title: Join a diverse group of business leaders and HR practitioners

children.value: Human Is NOT a Resource is not a speaker–led conference but an interactive program offered by practitioners for practitioners, exploring actionable strategies to nurture talent and cultivate a culture of innovation and agility.

Explore practical strategies to nurture talent, cultivate a culture of innovation and agility, and create sustained growth in an increasingly competitive and borderless world. Receive tools to transform yourself as you transform your organization.

sectionContent.quote:
Human is NOT a Resource. A human being is a tremendous possibility.
If we approach human beings as resources, then we will never unfold their innate genius.

children.value: Chairman, Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO)

I believe this program is really a transformational program. It renovates individuals to a next higher level to take up responsibilities in organizations, communities. This leads to better community leadership, industrial ecosystem, business and economy progress. I think it's very important for the country. I think this is a transformation that we need at this time. HINAR is really a transformational experience for all those who are coming to get a different perspective of management of systems.
Executive Director HR, Hindustan Unilever; CHRO, Unilever South Asia

I'm delighted that the Isha Foundation has created Human Is Not A Resource where we encourage leaders to think about this. This program feels different because usually in most programs that I've seen there's a homogeneity of crowd. This is a completely diverse set of leaders, diverse set of backgrounds and experiences and therefore there is such a diversity of thought, ideas, different realities coming together and a genuine opportunity to problem solve, learn from each other and add to each other.
CEO, Tata Digital

This is my first visit to Isha. I must say that when I first entered the premises, I was just amazed. First of all, the tranquility of the whole place, the people, the diversity and just the sheer sincerity of all the people. [I am] very impressed with the people and the whole audience. It's a very different way that [Isha prepares] the speakers. Any other business programs, you will be miked up, tensed with a proper coat, tie, and a blue shirt and a black pant. But this is very normal, very different, and very Indian.
Founder, Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Ltd.

First of all, I have never seen this kind of ambience before. It's beautiful. I think the way it is organized with mentors in each one of the tables, that is something very unique here, and I think that is something which everyone will treasure.
Former Indian Cricketer, Cricket Coach, Commentator

I feel it is not just about going through books or manuals. It's a holistic program where there is Yoga, where there is something else, team bonding [and so much more]. I think it's definitely very exciting for the participants.
Professor, Organizational Behavior & Human Resources Management; Chairperson, Digital Learning, IIM Bangalore

I think one of the first things that strikes you as you come in is there is so much welcoming energy as you come in. The other one I think what I take back is that there exists so much of native wisdom in this room. I think it can create magic.
explore organizational culture, talent nurturing and leading people through frameworks and live case studies
with extensive experience to mentor and help create a transformation plan unique to your business
through the eyes of a Mystic as Sadhguru offers his inspirational yet delightfully simple and pragmatic perspectives on leadership and its many challenges.
with a highly accomplished peer group; get access to INSIGHT alumni and receive invaluable support throughout your scale-up journey.
your inner-self with simple but powerful tools designed by Sadhguru to help develop insight, while being rooted in inner stability and balance.
Director, Cotton Blossom India Pvt Limited

As soon as this program started, we had one of Sadhguru’s insights where he said, “Human is a possibility.” Suddenly I saw that the way we are looking at HR in my company, we never looked at people as a possibility. That was like a framework for me. It will not be an HR department anymore. I think it will be a “possibility department”.
Managing Director , Shwetambara Enterprises

I had never interacted with Isha before, but it’s been an absolutely wonderful, heartfelt touching experience. And what it’s done, I think from a professional perspective, I’m absolutely sure it’s going to help change the dynamics for us.
Country Sale Head, Cyber Security, Commercial Enterprises, India and SAARC, Cisco Systems

The Resource Leaders have an absolute wealth of information, experience, and ability to guide you in this transformation which I am personally going through which impacts my teams, and my organisation.
MD, Sapphire Lifesciences Pvt Ltd

I wish I could have been here 5-6 years ago: things would be very different with my organization, with me in particular, and the way I would have dealt with my team. It's an enlightenment from all aspects.
Former President & CHRO, Tata Motors
I have been part of programs at some of the finest business schools in the world but no program matches this.
Founder & Partner, Gem Machinery & Allied Industries

HINAR had some very important tools that were very relevant for my business. We started creating a culture of engagement, empathy, and transparency and our data on resignations and dismissals last year was quite commendable for an industry like ours.
Get mentored by highly-reputed business leaders from various industries and backgrounds, with over 500 years of combined experience, in this one-of-a-kind program.

cards.title: Amit Anchal
cards.designation: Board Member, Ola Electric

children.value:
Amit is a Board member of Ola Electric and has led Strategy, Corporate Finance and Corporate Development for Ola & Ola Electric for the last couple of years.

He partners with the Founder (Bhavish Aggarwal) in bringing strategic direction to the businesses as well as leads the corporate finance for the group including Equity, Debt fundraising, Capital Market (IPO), Corporate structuring, M&A etc.

Prior to his current role, Amit led similar role for Airtel and Bharti Group Companies.

Amit has always worked with first generation enterprises. Before his current role with Bhavish, he was with Airtel working directly with Sunil Mittal in various roles for 18 years.

Amit has worked with first generation entrepreneurs in building strategy and executing fast growth. In the last 24 months he has worked closely with Bhavish as Ola electric scaled up to be the iconic EV play in India.

Similarly, he has been part of Bharti and Airtel’s phenomenal growth and expansion for close to 18 years.

He has also been a part of several strategic and growth initiatives such as Indus and Infratel Towerco creation, Africa passive infra sale and lease back, IT & Network outsourcing (all Harvard Case studies now).

Amit has been a foremost deal-maker and fund raiser (Private and Capital markets) throughout his career. In Airtel itself he has successfully executed over 70 large transactions of M&A, Fundraising, JV etc. Many of these deals are multi-billion dollar ones.

Amit enjoys very strong relationships with funds across VC, PE and Capital market spectrum and has led fundraising that are largest in the PE space in India.

He has worked on businesses across sectors including Consumer Internet, EV, Fintech, Telecom, Towers, Renewable energy etc.

cards.title: Anala Padmanabha
cards.designation: Consultant, Director, Mckinsey/UAE

children.value:
Anala Padmanabha, is a leader in the People & Organizational Performance Practice. She delivers growth, innovation, and organizational agility and is an expert on culture change, leadership development, team effectiveness, capability building, and transformation. She also works extensively with clients to drive organizational effectiveness at pivotal moments—such as merger, strategic shift, and crisis—and lead large-scale performance improvement programs integrating strategic, operational, and cultural initiatives.

Anala’s consulting journey began with EY as senior consultant majoring in Mergers and Acquisitions. Being a Chartered Accountant gave her further insights into international business and relations. This exposure took her to work with IDA and other international organizations associated in fostering a healthy culture, Diversity, Inclusion and a holistic growth oriented economy. McKinsey offered Anala a platform to build sustainable human development and performance models along with powering the learning and development engine of many organizations, Governments, Non-Profit Organizations to name a few.

Anala is also the founder director of a real estate Development firm in Benagaluru, which aims at building ESG and sustainable buildings. Featured by the Architectural digest, this award winning firm has projects all over India and aboard, aiming at building sustainable and Environmental friendly projects.

Anala is an active volunteer at Isha Foundation, a trained classical singer, a yoga practitioner and meditator, an avid reader, a certified scuba diver, a teacher and loves spending time with students. She thinks that the future leadership should be that of inclusion and responsible.

cards.title: Ashutosh Pandey
cards.designation: Managing Director & Chief Executive Officer, Mahindra First Choice Wheels

children.value:
Mr. Ashutosh Pandey is the CEO & MD of Mahindra First Choice Wheels.

Previously, he was the CEO of Tata CLiQ (Tata Unistore Limited), the digital commerce venture of the Tata Group, a business that he was responsible for founding and developing in the period October 2014 to May 2018.

Ashutosh has more than two decades of experience in leadership roles across E- commerce and Retail, and functional roles in diverse industries.

He joined the Tata Group in 1998 as a member of its flagship cadre, the Tata Administrative Services (TAS). Over the next sixteen years, Ashutosh took up challenging assignments in Tata Global Beverages (erstwhile Tata Tea), Rallis India, Tata Communications and the Taj Group of Hotels, in functions spanning marketing, strategy, business development and project management. He also worked with Accenture Consulting for a year, where he was responsible for the post-merger integration of two large Companies.

Before taking up his assignment as CEO of Tata Unistore in 2014, he was the COO of Landmark E-Tail Limited, Trent’s online retail business, from 2013 to 2014. He was earlier the COO and Business Head of Landmark, one of India’s leading leisure and entertainment retailers, from 2009 to 2013. During this time, he was responsible for the turnaround in the retail format besides building the brand, customer connect and store operations.

Ashutosh is an MBA from FMS Delhi and holds a BE degree from BIT Sindri. He is based in Mumbai where he lives with his wife Aparna and two lovely daughters, Shriya and Shraddha.

cards.title: Gagan Adlakha
cards.designation: Leadership Coach and Senior Partner, Vyaktitva

children.value:
Helping create conscious leaders, leadership teams, and organizations.Gagan is a Leadership Coach and a specialist in the area of Leadership Development and people performance with about 30 years of experience. An XLRI 1990 alumnus, Gagan joined the IT sector in its high growth phase and handled a variety of roles covering the complete gamut of the HR function for about 10 years. He rounded off his corporate experience by handling business roles for the next few years.
